story:
Why bother doing this?

As young lads, we want to explore more of our potential and spend more quality time with our friends and family. We (Muhamad Azree and Fuad Ismail, 27) managed to build our home using 4 reclaimed container units a year ago. We have aspired many people mostly youngsters and married couple that building our own home and buying our own land is not impossible! 

Since we have been receiving many request from public to stay and experience a night here, we are running out of space to most guest. Currently, the house can accommodate 6 people at a time (2+1) X 2 and we want to add the quota by using Concrete Culvert Tubes (so called Tube @ Container House) so you we can bring another 6 people at the same time.

  • We are easy going and positive minded people. We want more people like minded to join and be part of this exciting journey.
  • Upon your stay here, we will educate visitors by showcasing the idea of building the container house and the processes necessary.
  • We even will offer few other entertainment like in-tube entertainment unit where you can play games, karaoke or watch some movies. 
  • Backers can also ride the bicycles provided to visit nearby mangrove park and play some outdoor & traditional activities.
  • There will be hammock on rooftop where you can lay down and read your favorite book 

How can you back us and how will we repay your generosity

To build Tube, we will need approximately RM16000 (Malaysian Ringgit Sixteen Thousand) or around 4000 USD. We target to complete the project on 1st November 2016

  • The money funded will be used to buy the tubes (preferebaly minimum 6 feet in diameter and 6 feet high and will cost around RM4000)
  • The remaining of the money will be broken into 3 major requirements
    1. The glass door on 1 side of each Tube, outdoor Glass Toilet, Sink, Pantry and staircase
    2. Interior design (bed and decoration) + 1 unit of air conditioner
    3. Entertainment Unit (Embedded TV, Game Console and Satellite TV)
  • The money will surely not enough to cover the entire cost of building it, but we will allocate some personal fund into the project too. 
  • Most of the work will be done by us and DIY-ing. Backers can come and help us too. Can be a fun activity.

Project Location & Timeline

The project will be done at the compound of Rumah Kontena, Klang. Here's the location map to the house. (MAP)

We planned to execute the project on weekly basis:

  • 2nd Week of August to 2nd Week of September :
    Start Crowfunding
  • 3rd Week of September :
    Buying material and start building the base for tube and base of toilet
  • 4th Week of September:
    Start ordering for the concrete tube to site and ordering glass windows, doors and toilet wall (glass)
  • 1st Week of October:
    Interior Decoration Purchases
  • 2nd to 4th Week of October:
    Painting, Electical Wiring, Entertainment Area Fitting and Air Conditioning Unit Installation
  • 1st November:
    Launching Date! BBQ with backers and Start to Accommodate  first 6 earliest Backers. 
  • Priority of accommodation turn will be given based on date backed (donated).
  • A calendar will be shared online and date can be adjusted to later date if backers not available that week in www.rumahkontena.com/tube

By backing us, you are actually assisting us on empowering & inspiring more people that come

As part of the objectives, this project will help many people to be able to experience a life in container house more. We want to help youngsters to begin building their own home with very minimal cost compared to buying a ready made unit by developers. If there's more container house erected and more people come we actually:

  • Supporting the environment by reclaiming unused containers
  • Reducing the green house effect
  • Relieving dilemma of housing among youngsters and newly married couple
  • Shortening the period of loan tenure from 35 to 10 years instead.
  • Supporting big life in smaller house. Enriching every aspect.

If we don't get funded accordingly

Perhaps the project won't be realized within this year or next year as well

  • We have loan to repay every month and we can only secure minimum saving every month
  • Less people may stay and less likely we can educate more people
  • Left heartbroken, lol. Just Kidddin'

Other Ways You Can Help

The plan is to rent a unit for Rm60 / night for maximum 2 occupants per unit.
If you back now, you are eligible for the free BBQ dinner. Booking later, the bbq will not be provided. If you can't help us by backing with some fund, helping us as volunteer on every weekend will be a very good contribution too! Or at least, help spread this project to allow us to get more fund. If the fund is exceeding targeted budget, we will donate it back to the needy (orphanage shelter) where backers may be invited to the event too. And after the period of accommodating backers completed, we will continue renting the unit to public and plan to donate the profit generated as part of our CSR program. 

Again, we are just 2 young lad who wanted to change the world.
Alone we can do good but together, we can go further.

Please watch the videos in the playlist provided below to get to know a little about our journey on building the house, 1 year ago.

story:
Vigilantly track your friends and your animals with the longest range, smartphone-based GPS tracking system ever. The Laelaps long range GPS tracker uses a 2 Watt MURS band radio that connects over Bluetooth to your smartphone displaying positions on high resolution satellite maps. The system is designed for hunting, adventure, and security with trackers that are secured with Amish-made, urethane on nylon plastic collars for dogs or durable nylon backpack/belt straps for adventure. We wanted to get the system far along before we brought it to Kickstarter and right now over 40 trackers are in the field being testing by people like you. 

 

 

Our backers have been asking, how durable are the Laelaps collars? Need a really freak’n tough dog collar that will stand up? Ever leave a collar on a truck tire? Drop it off a cliff? Forget it on a pile of Tannerite? Tannerite? Yes, we tested Laelaps by exploding Tannerite under a collar with a high velocity rifle round. Watch carefully and see Laelaps fly 50 feet into the air above the explosion. We hope you don’t try this with your dog, but if you do, Laelaps will track him. Not only did Laelaps survive the explosion, but it tracked positions afterwards.

We built a powerful radio with carefully optimized signal efficiency to power through brush and around terrain. You can communicate with each other and watch your dogs in the field, tracking their speed and position. Today, there are no other trackers that combine extreme long range with high precision satellite imagery. And because you are carrying your own high-power radio the system works off the grid, in any remote location. 

The standard reward gives you one communicator and one remote tracker. Adding communicators and trackers, up to 2 communicators total and 20 trackers, your friends and dogs are linked by a powerful radio tested at over 10 mile linear range in the woods and over 15 miles in clearer terrain. 

Current State of Laelaps Long Range Tracker System

Unlike many projects, we went ahead and completed our electronics and hard molded our plastics, developed our Android App, and went out to Beta testers through the United States before coming to Kickstarter. The images here are of our operational units. To demonstrate current capabilities, see the two videos below. Rocky went out to Dripping Springs, Texas to do an extreme range test a few weeks ago, and tracked four tracking collars over 15 miles away using our full solution - communicator, multiple remote collars, and smartphone. The second video is a day out with our dogs where we tracked 5 collars simultaneously. We are also able to record and play back data and paths to look for patterns and see what happened over the course of a day. Battery life, range, and solid performance are all checking out and A-OK. What remains is incorporating Beta tester feedback, placing a bulk order for plastics and electronics, and finishing the iOS application. 

Indiegogo allows you to select one reward level for each project, so to get more trackers and collars, just add $150 for an additional communicator (max 2) and $200 for each tracker (max 20). If you choose the K9GPS reward levels, these trackers will be plastic on nylon collars unless you specify otherwise. 

Adventure Reward - Text & Position off the Grid

The Adventure Rewards come with two communicators you can use to send text messages and position to your friends while viewing the positions of the GPS trackers. This allows you to use Laelaps for tracking and communication off the grid. Two-way VHF lets you text your friends and visualize GPS positions in the wilderness with no cell service required. Guides and parents can track others while messaging one another, so your team can split up and track. 

Note that the communicators do not contain their own GPS sensor, relying on your cell phone's sensor to provide GPS positions to the other communicator user. Alternately, you can use a tracker to provide GPS location if those are not allocated to others in the field. 

Beta Testers

We wanted to get the tracker far along before we brought it to Kickstarter and right now over 40 trackers are in the field for testing by people like you.

These collar are really freakin’ tough.  We selected beta testers from applications submitted online - folks just like you. They tracked dogs through mud, rain, and snow, abusing our system in river bottoms, swamps, and on mountains. The K9GPS held up great.  

The smartphone app lets you you communicate off the grid, track the full history of each tracker. 

ff the Grid GPS Tracking

The Laelaps trackers have highly sensitive GPS receivers giving accurate position reports to a powerful 2W MURS band VHF radio that has a linear range exceeding 15 miles. The K9GPS handheld communicator receives the position reports and sends them to an app running on your smartphone for display on high resolution satellite maps, no cell service required. Communication between the communicator and collar lets the app control collar transmit intervals of as fast as every 1 second, turn the collar radio on and off, change the radio channel, activate tone and vibrate and more.

Today, there are no other trackers that combine extreme long range with high precision satellite imagery. And, it works without mobile data or cellular coverage. The smartphone app lets you communicate off-grid, track the full history of the adventure, share information with friends, and adjust the tracker settings on the fly.

Performance

  • Automatic frequency allocation for 20 trackers
  • Range exceeding 10 linear miles with advanced signal management
  • State of the art GPS technology provides position accuracy of 2 meters CEP
  • Radio de-confliction technology automatically self-configures collars to transmit without interference
  • Field proven durability with IP-68 Waterproof tested and abusive field beta test ongoing

Position Refresh & Battery Life

  • Positional update rate can be adjusted by the user with lower refresh rates providing longer battery life
  • Configurable refresh rate of GPS update of 1 second for 4 trackers, and 5 seconds for 20 trackers
  • Tracker battery life ranging from 24 hours to multiple days depending on refresh rate

Powerful 2 Watt MURS Band Transceiver

  • Longest off-grid range on market, 15+ miles range line-of-sight
  • Two-way communication between collar and handheld (communicator)
  • Two-way text message communication between handhelds (communicator)
  • No cell service required

Super-efficient NiTi Antenna

  • Memory wire antenna resists breaking
  • Field replaceable using set screw
  • Bushwacker 1mm NiTi wire antenna for heavy use
  • Comfort 0.5mm NiTi wire training antenna
  • Speedo cable option 

Deluxe Reward

The Deluxe Rewards include a customized Pelican-style case and a leather communicator holster that help you get your trackers to the adventure and properly carry your communicator in the field. We recommend the Deluxe rewards to keep your gear safe and ready for each adventure.  

Nitty Gritty - Configuration & Adding Trackers

It's important to see how the app works in the field, and just last weekend Rocky shot this video which shows the current process for adding and naming trackers in the Laelaps app. We are working to make everything as simple and smooth as possible given the range of configuration options offered by the system. 

Risks and challenges

We worked vigilantly to prepare Laelaps prior to crowdfunding and believe we have significantly reduced most of the major time and technical risk factors. The Laelaps system has received US FCC approval and is currently being used in the field. In the course of our most recent testing we have identified minor hardware and software improvements and we are incorporating these into the final production units. In addition we are currently in development of the iOS application. Plastics are hard molded and we are able to place our production order at any time. Given our current status and successful field testing by users in the field we have driven the project to production readiness.

story:
InstantCool: the wearable AC unit for outdoor use

--- Just in time for the summer season!

Summer is coming! Are you prepared for the heat waves outside when air conditioning is not available? Meet InstantCool vest, a cost-effective alternative to portable AC unit that uses NASA-developed technology to cool you with ice water circulated from the reservoir via a high-efficiency battery powered pump.

 

---10 Seconds Instant Cooling Effect---

Why Liquid Cooling Works Best

NASA pioneered the use of garments employing circulating chilled liquid in the 1960's to keep astronauts cool during spacewalks. Systems of similar construction are currently in use by military personnel in aircraft and armored land vehicles. These systems are very expensive because they use compressor-based refrigeration units to chill the circulating liquid coolant. By substituting ordinary ice to chill the water, the cost and complexity of the system are greatly reduced, making the InstantCool cooling system affordable, yet still truly effective.

 

---One-Touch Button---

Temperature Control within Comfort Zone

Worried if the temperature is appropriate for you? You can switch your vest on/off using the button to adjust the temperature according to your preference. This way, you control the temperature within your comfort zone.

 

Test Video-Cooling Effect

From the video, we can see that it takes effect in 10 seconds. Though it takes more time for the test instrument to reflect the temperature change, we can feel the cooling almost instantly if we put the vest on.
 
We've asked some random people nearby to help us test the vest a few days earlier. Check it out what they say about our InstantCool vest :) 
 

This is detailed product review from TK! Everything you wanted to know about our vest, and more.

 

Featured on

 

No-Bummer Summer

InstantCool provides the wearer with consistent, continuous relief from heat stress at an affordable price, it can beat the heat in 10 seconds and is the best choice for a wide variety of people who work and play outdoors. 

 

How to use it


Lightweight 3-layer fabric


 

---Easy to Wash---

Odor No More

 

If you need to wash the vest, you just need to pull out the plugs, remove the ice box and the water pump, and pull out the USB port and the mobile power bank. You can do it in less than 30 seconds. It is super easy and prevents odors compared to other cooling vests on the market.

 

InstantCool - The Most Affordable Active Cooling Vest

 

Need a better performance one for work? Meet InstantCool heavy duty version

InstantCool - Heavy Duty

InstantCool Heavy Duty replaces the ice boxes with a high volume insulated bottle and a backpack so that it can work continuously for about 2-4 hours without the need to replace the ice boxes. It is heavier, but with the design of the backpack and the extended tube, you can leave the insulated bottle near you instead of carrying it around.  

 

Available in Two Colors

 

 

 

Choose Your Vest

 

Sizing Guide

*XXXXL is customized and not included in the original perk. If you'd like to choose this size, please choose the 4XL perk instead.

 

Perks

InstantCool vest, lightweight with replaceable ice boxes, suitable for daily tasks and other outdoor activities. Only $119 early bird, save $25 off future MSRP! Get one now and stay out of the heat right now! 

InstantCool - Heavy Duty version, which is more suitable for work. The new version can work continuously for about 2-4 hours without the need to replace the ice boxes. It is a little heavier, but with the design of the backpack and extended tube, you can leave the insulated bottle near you instead of carrying it around.

InstantCool vest, lightweight with replaceable ice boxes, suitable for daily tasks and other outdoor activities. Only $219 early bird for two sets, save 31% off future MSRP! Get one for yourself and one for your loved one and stay out of the heat right now! 

InstantCool tryout, try the InstantCool Insulated Bottle at only $28. It is a super large capacity that meets all your need in summer. It uses 304 stainless steel and keeps cool or warm for up to 72 hours! Includes: 1 x 64oz Vacuum Insulated Stainless Steel Bottle with Cap.

 

 By creating InstantCool, we're aiming to bring a more enjoyable work or play environment for people that are suffering. Please kindly help us share the campaign to more people so that it can bring a real change for those in need. 

For media inquiries, please contact press@instantcool.cc.

 

The Design Journey

In 2017, by chance, we came across a military cooling suit and marveled at its super cooling effect in the high temperature environment the soldiers were exposed. However, its bulky size troubled us. We thought it was possible to transform the military cooling garment into a version that would be convenient for the everyday life. We did a series of tests and improvements. We eventually developed the InstantCool cooling garment: it is cooling-effective and portable, which is by far the most reasonable cooling solution for human body.

CEO Interview - Why we created InstantCool

 

Timeline

 

About the Team

Volcanoes Electronics Co, Ltd. is an innovative company dedicated to product development. Eddy, the Chief R&D Engineer, has more than 10 years of design experience. The core members are experienced in product development and supply chain management in world-class enterprises.

FAQ

 

Q: What kind of zippers do you use?

A: All zippers used in the vests will be YKK.

Q: What is the weight of your vest?

A: Final product weight is about 1100g without ice boxes.

Q: Does the vest accept machine washing?

A: No, but you can easily disassemble the electronic parts in less than 30s and wash it by hand.

Q: May I use the vest battery to recharge my cellphone?

A: No. The external battery is specially designed for the vest, and you cannot use it to charge your other devices.

Q: I´m very interested in your product, can I get an extra discount if I buy a big quantity?

A: At this moment we are focused in our crowdfunding campaign and do not have any wholesaling agreements in our roadmap, nor are we allowed to offer extra discounts because we are already offering the lowest possible prices for our IndieGoGo backers. However, we are very happy to hear that you like our product and it makes us want to work harder in the future. Feel free to contact us anytime with your comments or suggestions.

Q: In what countries and currencies can I buy the vest?

A: We will send the vest to any country that can be reached through standard methods without setting any additional restrictions. The prices are specified in USD but it will be converted to your local currency by the payment gateway.

Q: Will the water leak and is the power bank safe? Is it safe if I always wear this cooling vest?

A: We have tested more than 100 times and 200 hours in the lab, and the water will not leak.It’s safe to wear this vest frequently. This vest uses contact heat distribution, which is even safer and more comfortable than the air-conditioner.


Q: When will the product be finished, and when will the orders be shipped?
A: The product and all tooling have been finished. We will ship in June 2018.

Q: Will the water leak and is the power bank safe? Is it safe if I always wear this cooling vest?
A: We have tested more than 100 times and 200 hours in the lab, and the water will not leak.
It’s safe to wear this vest frequently. This vest uses contact heat distribution, which is even safer and more comfortable than the air-conditioner.

Q: Will the tube leak, will the tube broke as the temperature change, and how long will the tube last?
A: This PU tube is very strong with 400kgf/c㎡ tensile strength, 110kg/c㎡ tear strength, and working -40℉ (-40℃) to 176℉ (80℃), tubes in this cooling vest could be used for more than 15 years.

Q: Does any component need replace regularly. Where could I buy a replacement after crowdfunding? Is it possible to customize the color and size?
A: There is no component that needs to be replaced regularly. After crowdfunding, we will list all components on Amazon, eBay, and our official website. The customer can choose what they want. After crowdfunding, you can customize color and size, but we there will be a MOQ request.

Q: How long will the power bank last? Can it work for phone or other devices?
A: If the water pumps are turned on non-stop, the power bank can support the water pump for 3.5 hours. Generally, the water pump should turn on and turn off regularly. In this case, it could last for 7-8 hours. The power bank can be charged by a micro USB cable. It could be fully charged in 4 hours. The pack includes cable and power bank, no charger, general cell phone or tablet charger could work for this power bank. This power bank outlet voltage is 12V, do not use this power bank charge cellphone or another device.

Q: How long will 1pcs ice case last?
A: This depends on the environment temperature and user condition, the general situation is that one ice case could be used for 40 minutes to 60 minutes.

Q: Will the tube touch my skin, and will it be too baggy?
A: It’s better to wear T-shirt or clothes inside, even not, the tube will not touch skin directly, the tube was sewed in inside. The ice case is inside the ice bag, it will not be too baggy.

Q: Is it durable, and flexible enough?
A: Yes, it is the flexible and entire unit is well made, it could use for golf and other sports or work.

Q: How do I wash it after it becomes dirty?
A: You need to take out all components following the user manual, before washing it by hand. Machine wash is not supported at this moment.

Q: Does this recirculate the same water over and over, could I change out the water or add ice to it? Is the water in plastic case drinkable?
A: Yes, the pump circulates the water from bag to tube, you could change the bladder’s water, or directly put ice with water into water bag. After ice melt in the plastic case, the water is drinkable, water in the case do not circulate in the tube system, and the plastic is food grade HDPE.

Q: For how long can I use this product?
A: The warranty is 1 year, and it can be used for around 5 years.

Q: What kind of component could I buy extra?
A: We sell the exclusive power bank, and 6pcs ice case in a heat insulation bag.

Q: What is the temperature of the tube? How heavy is the whole system?
A: If fill the water bag with ice case, the tube temperature is around 53℉ (12℃), if fill the water bag with ice cube directly, the tube temperature is around 46℉ (8℃), you will feel very cool as you will wear a T-shirt underneath. The whole system with water and ice weight would be 3LB (1.4kg), the net weight of the system is 2.42LB (1.1kg).

Q: If I wear this cooling jacket a whole day, will I feel very heavy and will my shoulder get sore?
A: You will not feel too heavy even after an entire day because the weight is not distributed on your shoulder only. Instead, it is distributed across your body because it is a snug fit for your body.

Where could I buy a replacement after crowdfunding? Is it possible to customize the color and size?A: There is no component that needs to be replaced regularly. After crowdfunding, we will list all components on Amazon, eBay, and our official website. The customer can choose what they want. After crowdfunding, you can customize color and size, but we there will be a MOQ request.Q: How long will the power bank last? Can it work for phone or other devices?A: If the water pumps are turned on non-stop, the power bank can support the water pump for 3.5 hours. Generally, the water pump should turn on and turn off regularly. In this case, it could last for 7-8 hours. The power bank can be charged by a micro USB cable. It could be fully charged in 4 hours. The pack includes cable and power bank, no charger, general cell phone or tablet charger could work for this power bank. This power bank outlet voltage is 12V, do not use this power bank charge cellphone or another device.Q: How long will 1pcs ice case last?A: This depends on the environment temperature and user condition, the general situation is that one ice case could be used for 40 minutes to 60 minutes.Q: Will the tube touch my skin, and will it be too baggy?A: It’s better to wear T-shirt or clothes inside, even not, the tube will not touch skin directly, the tube was sewed in inside. The ice case is inside the ice bag, it will not be too baggy.Q: Is it durable, and flexible enough?A: Yes, it is the flexible and entire unit is well made, it could use for golf and other sports or work.Q: How do I wash it after it becomes dirty?A: You need to take out all components following the user manual, before washing it by hand. Machine wash is not supported at this moment.Q: Does this recirculate the same water over and over, could I change out the water or add ice to it? Is the water in plastic case drinkable?A: Yes, the pump circulates the water from bag to tube, you could change the bladder’s water, or directly put ice with water into water bag. After ice melt in the plastic case, the water is drinkable, water in the case do not circulate in the tube system, and the plastic is food grade HDPE.Q: For how long can I use this product?A: The warranty is 1 year, and it can be used for around 5 years.Q: What kind of component could I buy extra?A: We sell the exclusive power bank, and 6pcs ice case in a heat insulation bag.Q: What is the temperature of the tube? How heavy is the whole system?A: If fill the water bag with ice case, the tube temperature is around 53℉ (12℃), if fill the water bag with ice cube directly, the tube temperature is around 46℉ (8℃), you will feel very cool as you will wear a T-shirt underneath. The whole system with water and ice weight would be 3LB (1.4kg), the net weight of the system is 2.42LB (1.1kg).Q: If I wear this cooling jacket a whole day, will I feel very heavy and will my shoulder get sore?A: You will not feel too heavy even after an entire day because the weight is not distributed on your shoulder only. Instead, it is distributed across your body because it is a snug fit for your body.

story:
Where innovation and efficiency meet!

 

 

Hello!

We are the 'Ne-Ne-tool.com' team of innovators and engineers whom are specialists in designing and manufacturing tools. After 2 year of designing and testing prototypes, we are glad to present you one member of Ne-Ne-Tool family X NavigatorX credit size multi navigation tool.  

 NavigatorX

NavigatorX is unique card what will help you to navigate, measure distance to targets, read the time with sundial or using star clock. Also with this card you can convert units from metric to imperial and reverse. This card will help you to determinate approximately sunset. 

NavigatorX with Unit converter

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

With NavigatorX in your pocket you will able to:

  •     Calculate distance from lightning in km or mi
  •     Tell Time With Stars! A Counter-Clockwise Star Clock
  •     Use Moon Navigation Find South during a Crescent Moon
  •     Measuring distance to target
  •     Calculate how much time until dark- estimate how much time you have before sunset.
  •     Convert imperial to metric distance units 
  •     Convert metric to imperial distance units 
  •     A sundial is a device that tells the time of day by the apparent position of the Sun in the sky.
  •      A compass marker what can be used for navigation and orientation that shows direction relative to the geographic cardinal directions 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Specifications

Dimensions 85 × 50 × 0.5 mm (3.3 × 2.1 × 0.019 in) 

Ne-Ne-tool.com the best EDC (Every Day Carry) Tools

Where innovation and efficiency meet

How it works?

 

Sundial Video

 

The tool is very simple to use alike can use adults and children very easily. The tool is very educational for your children, they can learn a lot about navigation and natural phenomena.

It's fun and educative

The tool is as big as a credit card, it can easily and simply fit into your wallet and carry with you everywhere. It will always be available if you need it. 

 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You are able to order Navigator X in three colors White Black and Blue  

Three colors White Black and Blue слика

Three colors White Black and Blue

 

Unlimited use with unlimited possibilities!

 

 

Blue

White

 

 

 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

All of this tools are great gift.

We're happy to help make alternative shipping arrangements with tracking at additional cost if you require.

All of this tools are TSA compliant and slim enough to take anywhere

https://www.tsa.gov/travel/security-screening/w...

We need funding to be able to place a large order to bring down our material and production costs. 

 

 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Project schedule

Campaign Launch:  January 2020

Campaign Ends: March 2020

Production Starts: March 2020

Rewards Start Shipping: March 2020

 We like to have control of our production and adhere to our quoted schedule. As with our experience we will have Ne-Ne-tool Navigator X, delivered on schedule!

___________________________________________

 

Risks and challenges

We have more than 10th years’ experience in making a lot of different tools for different applications. We are professionals in this filed and we are able to manage all the challenges what will came up. The biggest risk to shipping on the stated delivery date, as always, is their production capacity or scheduling of other work at the time of our actual order but from our experience with good communication they shipped on time.

story:
Hey everyone!  Thank you for visiting our honeymoon registry! 

 

We will be starting out our lives together with a Bahamian adventure: sunbathing, snorkeling, and sipping through straws in coconuts…and possibly having out hair braided.  While the best possible present is your presence when we tie the knot, if you feel inclined to give us a gift as well, we would love a contribution to our honeymoon fund in lieu of traditional wedding presents. 

 

We leave the Monday following the wedding and fly from Omaha to Nassau, Bahamas, where we will spend one night.  The next day we take a puddle jumper over to Long Island where we will spend five nights at the Cape Santa Maria Resort. 

 

The island is home to Dean’s Blue Hole,  at 663 ft. it is the world’s deepest water filled sinkhole, where we look forward to honing our snorkeling skills.  The island also offers shark dives (EEK!) and offshore shipwreck explorations.  Most importantly it features some of the world’s most beautiful beaches and clear blue waters. 

 

We promise to send postcards and take tons of pictures of Theron frolicking in the Bahamian sun, snoozing on hammocks, and chasing seagulls.  If you have travelled in Nassau or Long Island before (not New York!!J) , we would love any tips or suggestions that you have.

 

Thank you so much for visiting our registry!  We look forward to seeing you June 21!

 

Love,

Theron & Katie

story:
Hello Everyone,


This year our 18 national team is trying to raise enough money so we can go to Nationals in June. Our goal is $5,000 so we can equally distribute it between 10 players to cut our cost significantly. 

It has been our dream as a volleyball club to be able to travel to places such as Phoenix, AZ and Orlando, FL and play in big tournaments. We are a dedicated team and we love playing with each other but we don't get a chance to go to big tournaments to really show our abilities to everyone. This team has been together for a long time, and most of us are seniors so this is our last year to play and we have yet to travel very far. If we were able to raise enough money to go, it would mean the world to us, especially the seniors. Every donation will put us that much close to our dream, so thank you very much.--Meredith

story:
The new revolutionary rental app Waanaa will cut out estate agents, saving landlords  and tenants hundreds of pounds. 

The easy search function will help tenants to access the local properties with a few clicks.   

The Waanaa app will help the landlords and tenants with up to date local stats about the local areas.



This campaign is very important for Tolga as he has personally suffered from rogue landlords in the past. Corrupt landlords must be known so that other tenants won't suffer same way.

The functions of the advance app will also help construction companies to cut freight costs. 

 As a contributor if you help this project you will not only support a project but help build an innovative idea which will change the way the housing market operates.  That will then have a major positive constructive impact on the community at large.
To realise this special project we will need 40.000 pounds where %52 will be spent on app development %30 for technical operations %10 for marketing of the app %8 for Indiegogo fees.


  • If you choose to be in the film of the making of the app.  You may not only help a good constructive project to become a reality this may also help you to promote yourself.


The Impact

You can have a major impact in your community and help all landlords and tenants to find a better match and have a better community. The property is essential for people as this is all about their daily life. It is common sense that the better the life quality the more productive the people are.

Tolga: I want to  assure you I will do whatever it takes  to make this project happen. 

There will be challenges ahead, these challenges can only be overcome with persistence and commitment. 

Tolga will mobilise his international experience and contacts in the business world to overcome these challenges.

Tolga is an Amazon number one best-selling author in UK, USA and Australia.  Tolga has a background in business information systems and received his BSc (Honours) degree in Business Information Systems from Leeds Metropolitan University. Tolga has provided consultancy many entrepreneurs executives business owners managers. In addition to being a consultant Tolga has got years of experience as a journalist and professional coach. Despite his demanding career, Tolga makes time to be involved with the community and professional organisations. Tolga lives in London and always seeks and works on inspiring new innovations and ideas.


 If you can't contribute this doesn't mean you can't help. 


- Please get the word out and make some noise about this Waanaa Campaign.
- Please use Indigogo Share tools!

story:
What is MealPlanBook?

MealPlanBook is the world's first crowdsourced meal planning application. Anyone can create meal plans in collaboration with family and friends; monitor nutritional analysis of every meal instantly and receive a shopping list of the ingredients. 

MealPlanBook, also serves as a marketplace for home cooks, chefs and healthcare professionals to connect with each other. Anyone can request an expert advice or purchase a healthy meal plan based on their needs from their favorite chefs, nutritionists or healthcare professionals.
The different features and tools of MealPlanBook keep you in check and help you make healthy meal choices.



Why Crowdsourcing?

The new trend has shown that Crowdsourcing brings a collective wisdom into any community and as a result, the community turns into a self-organizing system.

To manage our society's health, there is no better choice than inviting people's wisdom in a platform where people can take part in shaping their own health.


Here is a quick look at how it works:




It’s simple.


It’s free.


And you don’t have to do it alone! You can crowdsource it! 

How?

Start by setting your meal plan specifications (vegetarian, gluten free, low carb, heart healthy, etc...), budget and ease of preparation.

Then, invite family friends or anyone you like to join in the process. Make your very own meal planning team, on the fly!



Features:

MealPlanBook’s unique software provides you with real time feedback on nutritional value and portion size of each meal, based on the USDA Dietary Guidelines for Americans and The Healthy Eating Plate by Harvard School of Public Health.



Enter an existing recipe you have used for years, or create a new one and see where  it stands compared to the recommendations. Make the necessary adjustments to your meal so that you can  trust your food. 

MealPlanBook’s creative feature Plagraph (a combination of a plate and a graph) allows the user to view the food they have entered in their recipe graphed on a plate, in conjunction with a portion size scale. You can instantly measure the calories and nutritional value of your meal.

Why consuming a balanced food (from major food groups) is important?

Some common disorders are the result of imbalanced nutrition and improper food pairing. For instance, did you know that iron deficiency anemia is the most common nutritional deficiency and the leading cause of anemia in the United States? ( Ref: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention)

Or "did you know that about 1 of 7 older people who live in the community and about half of older people in long-term care facilities have undernutrition?" ( Ref: Merck Manuals/ Disorders of Nutrition)


Easily schedule your recipes...


Get and stay organized! Access your weekly shopping list in the cloud!  


By crowdsourcing your meal plan, you can turn the daunting task of meal planning into a fun social event and share it with the rest of the world. If you are in the spirit of doing good, create a meal planning team for a local charity and cook for a cause or your local school.


Engage your family, friends, a chef or your healthcare professional to collaborate with you. Invite them to your meal planning team.


If cooking is your passion or your career, you can publish your meal plans for your clients, publicly or privately!


Our Vision

At MealPlanBook, we believe that every person needs to be informed about the food they eat so that they can be empowered to make healthy changes to their meals.

About 20 years ago,  the Nutrition Facts label was introduced to help consumers make informed food choices and maintain healthy dietary practices. More recently, last month, the United States Food and Drug Administration released nutritional labeling rules for food service establishments (franchisors with more than 20 locations). While, government has initiated a great movement toward increasing food awareness, it is up to us to take responsibility for our homemade meals. Homemade recipes have not been standardized and monitored for their nutritional value, food group balance and portion control.

With the help of MealPlanBook nutritional analysis tools and the power of social support that comes through crowdsource meal planning, we can hold ourselves accountable and do the same for our homemade meals.

"If you feel the urgency to act, then support us." MealPlanBook is a patent pending tool that we want to make available for free to everyone. Join us in this venture and help to make it happen.


There are features in the application that require further development. The funds we receive from this campaign will go directly to the completion of the prototype and vigorous testing, to ensure steady and reliable results.  Furthermore, we will work with nutritionists to revise and approve homemade recipes in accordance to the recommendations.


Goals

Our three financial goals are:

1.  At $100,000, we will deliver the first version of the web application, free to users EVERYWHERE!

2.  For the next $50,000, we will standardize 1,000 recipes complete with portion size and nutritional facts so that everyone can see and use the recipes for free. Furthermore, our development team will keep developing more features.

3.  For the next $100,000, we will complete additional of 2,000 standardized recipes, complete with portion size and nutritional facts for everyone. We also will release a mobile app, which will be synced among different devices.

Lastly, we cannot stress enough the importance of bringing this effective nutritional information to the masses.
We are incredibly appreciative of any contribution you can make. Check out some rewards you can earn with your contribution on the right side of the screen.


Risks and Challenges

We have spent more than a year to investigate every aspect of this application and developed a prototype. The prototype for MealPlanBook is functional, however we still have work to develop all the features that we want. As many of you know, sometimes development becomes tricky and takes more time than expected. The good news is that we have earned a lot of experience in this area and when necessary, we will look for additional help to resolve any emerging problem.


Other Ways You Can Help!

Every little amount makes a difference. And for every dollar, we ask you to voice your support as well. If you like MealPlanBook help to move it forward and get the word out.
These are some other ways that comes to our mind:

Contacting local reporters or media outlets about MealPlanBook.


Sharing and liking MealPlanBook fanpage with others.


Following or tweeting MealPlanBook on Twitter.


Writing a commentary blog about benefits of MealPlanBook.



User stories:

MealPlanBook can help a wide range of users. If you wonder MealPlanBook can help you or not, watch the following user stories.


Check Grandpa and Grandma to see where they need help:

With MealPlanBook, Grandpa Stuart can bring his recipes to life and create healthy and affordable meals for his wife, children and grandchildren.


Here is Mary's problem:

For a registered nutritionist like Mary, checking her client’s meal plans via MealPlanBook is the perfect way to immediately serve her clients. As an added bonus, MealPlanBook offers users the option to sell their recipes and services online- a great way for Mary to get paid right away.


Watch James' story, a popular chef, and see why he can't make money from selling his fabulous meal plans?

Professional chefs can create their famous recipes with cooking instructions and pictures of each step on MealPlanBook and receive payment for their creations. Like James, a working chef and online entrepreneur who creates recipes and daily meals to share with his entire online social network, and earn cash if his followers decide to subscribe to his meal plans.


What is bothering Adam? Single dad who loves his little daughter, Sofia.

For Adam, who loves teaching his daughter how to cook and plan nutritional meals, MealPlanBook is a great platform where he can invite his friend and family, especially Sofia to create a healthy meal plan. 


Nancy is a mother of three children and her family needs are completely different:

For Nancy, MealPlanBook is ideal because she can instantly adjust her recipes to care for her family's need, especially for her little son who require special diet. Once she creates her meal plan, she can send it to her doctor for her recommendations.


Leadership

  • Roya Saleh, MD
  • Kurt D. Elkins, Esq
  • Shirin Saleh, MBA


Roya practiced medicine for four years as general practitioner, then worked as medical researcher on Cardiovascular diseases at David Geffen School of Medicine, division of Cardiovascular Imaging (DCVI @ UCLA) for seven years.

Kurt is a real estate lawyer. They live together in Orange County, California.

Inspired by the upstreamist Dr. Rishi who defined himself as upstreamist in healthcare, MealPlanBook was designed to shine the light on what we eat!

 "We believe, it must become our personal responsibility to avoid those sicknesses that origin from our own lifestyle choices"


Advisory board

  • Bita Imam, PhD candidate
  • Negin Behazin, MD 


We would like to thank everyone who contributed to MealPlanBook.

  • Ali  (Programmer)
  • Arwin  (Writer, Researcher)
  • Crystal  (Admin Support)
  • Jake  (Media producer)
  • Josh  (Actor) 
  • Laura  (Admin support)
  • Mary  (Creative Writer)
  • Olaitan  (Whiteboard animator) 
  • Rudyard  (Researcher)
  • Sara  (Creative Writer)
  • Simona   (Graphic design)
  • Urwin  (Programmer)


FAQ

1.  What is a meal plan?

Meal planning is a system that helps you simplify your life. It is an organized tool that pre-sets the number of meals you have in a day, a week, and/or a month, with the exact ingredients and recipes you will need to create each meal.

2.  How can a meal plan help me?

Meal planning is a system that saves you time and money- making grocery shopping quick and easy. Get focused on ingredients in your recipes and impulse purchases become non-existent. Meal planning is the perfect tool to help you become a mindful eater and keep yourself in check with the food you put into your body and the effect it has on your health.

3.  If I don’t want to publicly share my Meal Plan with the internet world, can I privately share it with family and friends?

Yes. If you are not comfortable sharing your meal plan with the world, you don’t have to. You can privately receive feedback from contributors you invite. And maintain a private account.

4.  When can I create an account?

We are so excited to hear you are interested in joining us. As mentioned above, MealPlanBook is still under construction and we need your support to bring it to the masses. Make a donation. Help us spread the word. Contact your local media channels. Let’s get this virtual kitchen in the hands of everyone for free so that we can live healthy and happy lives.


THANK YOU

Thank you for visiting our campaign. With your help, we can make a difference in everyone's health.

MealPlanBook Team

Easily schedule your recipes...





Get and stay organized! Access your weekly shopping list in the cloud!   






By crowdsourcing your meal plan, you can turn the daunting task of meal planning into a fun social event and share it with the rest of the world. If you are in the spirit of doing good, create a meal planning team for a local charity and cook for a cause or your local school.


Engage your family, friends, a chef or your healthcare professional to collaborate with you. Invite them to your meal planning team.





If cooking is your passion or your career, you can publish your meal plans for your clients, publicly or privately!


Our Vision 

At MealPlanBook, we believe that every
person needs to be informed about the food they eat so that they can be empowered to make healthy changes to their meals. 
About 20 years ago,  the Nutrition Facts label was introduced  to help consumers make
 informed food choices and maintain healthy dietary practices. More recently, last month, the United States Food and Drug Administration released nutritional labeling rules for food service establishments (franchisors with more than 20 locations). While, government has initiated a great movement toward increasing food awareness, it is up to us to take responsibility for our homemade meals. Homemade
recipes have not been standardized and monitored for their nutritional value, food group balance and portion control. 
With the help of MealPlanBook nutritional analysis tools and the power of social support that comes through crowdsource meal planning, we can hold ourselves accountable and do the same for
our homemade meals. 

"If you feel the urgency to act, then support us." MealPlanBook is a patent pending tool that we want to make available for
free to everyone. Join us in this venture and help to make it happen.


There are features in the application that require further development. The funds we receive from this campaign will go directly to
the completion of the prototype and vigorous testing, to ensure steady and reliable results.  Furthermore, we will work with nutritionists to revise and approve  homemade recipes in accordance to the recommendations.

Goals
Our three financial goals are:
1. 
At $100,000, we will deliver the
first version of the web application, free to users EVERYWHERE!
2.  For the next $50,000, we will
standardize 1,000 recipes complete with portion size and nutritional facts so
that everyone can see and use the recipes for free. Furthermore, our development team will keep developing more features. 
3.  For the next $100,000, we will
complete additional of 2,000 standardized recipes, complete with portion size and nutritional
facts for everyone. We also will release a mobile app, which will be synced among different devices.

Lastly, we cannot stress enough the
importance of bringing this effective nutritional information to the masses. 
We are incredibly appreciative of any
contribution you can make. Check out some rewards you can earn with your contribution on the right side of the screen.


Risks and Challenges
 We have spent more than a year to investigate every aspect of this application and developed a prototype.
The prototype for MealPlanBook is functional, however we still have work to develop all the features that we want. As many of you know, sometimes development becomes tricky and takes more time than expected. The good news is that we have earned a lot of experience in this area and when necessary, we will look for additional help to resolve any emerging problem. 

Other Ways You Can Help!
Every little amount makes a difference. And for
every dollar, we ask you to voice your support as well. If you like MealPlanBook help to move it forward and
get the word out.  These are some other ways that comes to our mind:


Contacting local
reporters or media outlets about MealPlanBook.






Sharing and liking MealPlanBook fanpage with others. 






Following or tweeting MealPlanBook on Twitter. 






Writing a commentary blog about benefits of MealPlanBook.





User stories:

MealPlanBook can help a wide range of users. If you wonder MealPlanBook can help you or not, watch the following user stories.

Check Grandpa and Grandma to see where they need help:

With MealPlanBook, Grandpa Stuart can bring his
recipes to life and create healthy and affordable meals for his wife, children
and grandchildren.

Here is Mary's problem: 

For a registered nutritionist like Mary,
checking her client’s meal plans via MealPlanBook is the perfect way to
immediately serve her clients. As an added bonus, MealPlanBook offers users the
option to sell their recipes and services online- a great way for Mary to get
paid right away.

Watch James' story, a popular chef, and see why he can't make money from selling his fabulous meal plans?

Professional chefs can create their famous recipes with cooking 
instructions and pictures of each step on MealPlanBook and receive 
payment for their creations. Like James, a working chef and online 
entrepreneur who creates recipes and daily meals to share with his 
entire online social network, and earn cash if his followers decide to 
subscribe to his meal plans.

What is bothering Adam? Single dad who loves his
little daughter, Sofia.

For Adam, who loves teaching his
daughter how to cook and plan nutritional meals, MealPlanBook is a great platform where he can invite his friend and family, especially Sofia to create a healthy meal plan. 

Nancy is a mother of three children and her family needs are completely different:

For Nancy, MealPlanBook is ideal because she can instantly adjust her recipes to care for her family's need, especially for her little son who require special diet. Once she creates her meal plan, she can send it to her doctor for her recommendations.

Leadership
Roya Saleh, MD
Kurt D. Elkins, Esq
Shirin Saleh, MBA


Roya practiced 
medicine for four years as general practitioner, then worked as medical 
researcher on Cardiovascular diseases at David Geffen School of Medicine, division of Cardiovascular Imaging (DCVI @ UCLA) for seven years.Kurt is a real estate lawyer. They live together in Orange County, California. 


Inspired by the upstreamist Dr. Rishi who defined himself as upstreamist in healthcare, MealPlanBook was designed to shine the light on what we eat!

 "We believe, it must become our
 personal responsibility to avoid those sicknesses that origin 
from our own lifestyle choices" 


Advisory board

Bita Imam, PhD candidate
Negin Behazin, MD 

We would like to thank everyone who contributed to MealPlanBook.


Ali  (Programmer)
Arwin  (Writer, Researcher)
Crystal  (Admin Support)

Jake  (Media producer)
Josh  (Actor) 
Laura  (Admin support)
Mary  (Creative Writer)
Olaitan  (Whiteboard animator) 
Rudyard  (Researcher)
Sara  (Creative Writer)

Simona   (Graphic design)

Urwin  (Programmer)



FAQ
1. 
What is a meal plan? 
Meal planning is a system that helps you
simplify your life. It is an organized tool that pre-sets the number of meals
you have in a day, a week, and/or a month, with the exact ingredients and
recipes you will need to create each meal. 
2. 
How can a meal plan help me?
Meal planning is a system that saves you time
and money- making grocery shopping quick and easy. Get focused on ingredients
in your recipes and impulse purchases become non-existent. Meal planning is the
perfect tool to help you become a mindful eater and keep yourself in check with
the food you put into your body and the effect it has on your health. 
3. 
If I don’t want to
publicly share my Meal Plan with the internet world, can I privately share it
with family and friends?
Yes. If you are not comfortable sharing
your meal plan with the world, you don’t have to. You can privately receive
feedback from contributors you invite. And maintain a private account.
4. 
When can I create an
account?
We are so excited to hear you are
interested in joining us. As mentioned above, MealPlanBook is still under
construction and we need your support to bring it to the masses. Make a
donation. Help us spread the word. Contact your local media channels. Let’s get
this virtual kitchen in the hands of everyone for free so that we can live
healthy and happy lives.
 

THANK YOU

Thank you for visiting our campaign. With your help, we can make a difference in everyone's health.
MealPlanBook Team

story:
What is Loopout?

Loopout is an impressively designed luggage securing device that revolutionize the travel industry.  It is designed and developed as a simple tie-down device to assist travelers to secure their carry-on luggage atop their large check-in luggage.

The name Loopout reflects its 2 loops appearance.  The original design started in summer of 2016 and has proceeded through phases of concept design, functional testing/proof of concept, material selection, market evaluation, prototyping and manufacturing.

Its installation is extremely simple and as illustrated by the video which the installation time measured in seconds.

Quality in material, aesthetic and construction

Loopout is constructed out of high density woven webbing that has two-tone color to bring strength and attractiveness that is rarely seen in the market. With all steel buckles hard oxide coated to achieve exceptional long wearability and weatherability. Its elastic loops are made out of high strength elastomer that has maximum flexibility to accommodate all sizes and shapes of handle bars on the wheeled luggage.

 

*Patent Pending

 

Loopout installation video

 
Loopout X2 Power Strap
 

A superbly designed luggage strap that efficiently tightens the luggage even after re-packing.

- Save 90% of time and effort for tightening up your luggage than traditional luggage straps

- Easy installation; remove and re-install in 10 sec.

- 2 tone color strap made with high grade durable material

- A good solution to attach oversize items with your wheeled luggage while travelling

 
Loopout X2 installation video
 

 

 

*************************************************************************
 

   Let's see what Customers say about Loopout...

 
*************************************************************************

story:
It seems outrageous to us that such an iconic hand tool in our country's history is no longer actually hand produced in our country.

There used to be more than 200 axe makers in Maine alone; today there are none.

So a year and a half ago, we started a company to change that. We began by restoring and selling vintage axes found at tool barns, swap meets and garage sales.

Along the way we had the pleasure of fixing up other people's old axes - and learning the stories behind them. Like the guy in San Francisco who found an axe in the wall of a home he was restoring or the gold prospector who found one washed up along a river in Idaho.

We've educated ourselves on the history and craft of axe-making and, with the help of local blacksmiths and machinists, are ready to forge our own axe using time-tested techniques and the highest quality American-made materials.

Beginning this summer, we are bringing back the Maine wedge pattern to make a versatile 2-pound camp axe we are calling the Allagash Cruiser.

We just need to raise some money to finish outfitting our shop with the right equipment. That's where your story joins our story.

WHAT WE NEED

1.       Gas Forges (2) …………………………………………………………………………    $1,250

2.       Exterior Propane Tank Depot & interior lines…………………………...      $500

3.       70 Ton Hydraulic Press …………………………………..………………………      $12,000

4.       Power Hammer …………….............……………………………………………..       $8,000

5.       Quenching Station for Hardening & Tempering………………………...      $250

6.       Tempering Oven   …………………………………………………………………….      $500

7.       Tooling & Dies for Hydraulic Press ……………………………………………      $2,500

8.       Welding Table ………………………………………………………………………….      $750

9.       Anvil, exhaust hood & duct work, and associated blacksmith tools    $2,000

10.     Upgrade shop electrical service for forging tools ……………………....     $1,000

                                                                                                                 TOTAL                 $28,750

WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU

We have some wicked good perks for our contributors. Check out the list to the right, or if you're more of a visual person see what these goodies look like for yourself by clicking here.

 

MEET THE GUYS

Brothers Mark and Steve Ferguson and their friend Barry Worthing are the principals in Brant & Cochran.

Mark and Steve grew up camping and canoeing all over the country where having an axe handy helped keep them warm and fed.  They also worked with their Grandfather, Leland Ferguson, in his machine shop and in his friends' light manufacturing businesses.  Brant & Cochran, named after Leland's 1950's tool supply business, brings the brothers' interest in the outdoors and love of working in a shop full circle.

Barry, a Maine native, grew up in a home where he learned to appreciate and use tools while working around the house with his father. DIY was the rule rather than the exception with a father who was raised during the Great Depression and was known to say “ make do, re-do or do without.” Over the years Barry has enjoyed the outdoor lifestyle Maine has to offer. A couple years ago he participated in a project building a wooden dory which has become a focus of his recent outdoor adventures. 

Other Ways You Can Help

There are other ways you can help us bring axe making back to Maine. 

  • Make some noise!  There are buttons at the top of this page where you can easily share our campaign via Facebook, Twitter and other social media sites.  You can also create a link to email your friends.

  • Send folks to our website, www.bnctools.com, to check out the perks for themselves.

Thanks for helping us out!

story:
AWEH!

We are the Aweh Backpackers in Durban, South Africa. A small cozy business with the emphasis on a family-vibe. We just relocated our business to the perfect spot. beautiful views, and great property.

We want to create a Backpackers with a friendly atmosphere and beautiful scenery.

For the last year, hundreds of tourists made their own contribution towards Aweh Backpackers. In the form of artworks, as well as stories. We don’t want to lose it, as the memories and the people are the heart and soul of Aweh.

It is our home. We are finding our way around to keep Aweh alive.

Our Project

We found our dream house for 185.000 $ (South African property is amazingly cheap in comparison). the house is going on auction soon, so we are trying to raise enough money to qualify for a bond. Right now we are trying to pay for licenses and outstanding bills of our start up renovations etc. This is our goal for this campaign. (Even though we are also looking at options of selling equity to would-be investors..)


What we truly believe, is that the best gift we can give to anyone who is willing to help us, is an experience rather than material things. We want you to experience South Africa with its amazing sights.

You always wanted to travel through South Africa? Or just need a break from the hard working life? Come and be part of our family!

Since the start of our business last year, we have managed to show positive figures - and the business is still growing - also at the new place we have bookings flying in.

Once we have the bond of the bank, we won´t have a problem paying it off every month, since we have a continuous income to maintain the house.

It is only the startup costs, which we are struggling with.

 

NO MONEY? NO PROBLEM

We know what it´s like not to have money to spare. And that is ok. You can help us by sharing our project! Get the word out. And facebook is just a few clicks away. If you like our vibe and what we have to present, give your friends the chance to come visit Aweh.

Let´s make this work, and together we can be truly Aweh! :)

story:
ADVENTURE TRAVEL NEEDED A BETTER PACK

A system that could take us way off the grid and deep into new cities. Something more comfortable and nimble, and loaded with tested features. In other words, a pack that goes where other “travel packs” only dream of.

So, we made it.

Introducing the Allpa 35L: a rugged, 35-liter backpack system built for adventure travel. This pack is perfectly sized for carry-on convenience, loaded with well-designed features, and tough enough to handle years of hard use.

 

The foundation of the Allpa is its unique, load-supporting suspension we adopted from our backpacking packs. This provides the comfort and support necessary for nimble travel, in addition to increasing security in high-traffic areas. Hand-held duffels and roller bags just can’t compete.

 

The Allpa features a sleek, 35L shape that stows into overhead bins, trunks, and buses with ease. The material is a tough TPU-coated 1000D polyester, with durable 1680D ballistic nylon paneling. We designed the pack without outer pockets, exposed buckles, pockets, and straps for good reason, knowing that these features often snag and get in the way while on the move.

 

With the pack splayed open, you’ll see that the left and right sides offer ample room for the bulkof your gear. We added one large zippered mesh compartment on the right for clothing and soft, moldable items, and then subdivided the left side with two small zippered pockets along the top and a central zippered mesh divider below to access the cavernous compartment underneath.

 

 

In terms of security, all external zippers feature our theft-proof webbing sewn across the openings. There’s also a sewn-in carabiner loop on the hip belt’s webbing to lock the pack to bus rails or a fixed point. 

Like our Nazca, we designed the Allpa with a slotted back panel to house the shoulder straps and hip belt, ensuring loose ends are a nonissue at the baggage claim, on the bus, or in the trunk of taxis. Top, side, and bottom grab handles provide multiple carry points while the shoulder straps are tucked away.

 

Once you’ve arrived at your destination, there’s even a stowable daypack that deploys for fast- and-light daytrips, hikes, and other excursions that demand a smaller, lighter pack. So, why’s it so colorful? Each Batac is part of our Del Día collection, meaning that it’s made from sections of remnant fabric.

Pair the Allpa with our new stowable Batac Daypack. This superlight 16L pack deploys for hikes and trips once you’ve arrived at your destination. Also, it’s part of our Del Día collection, meaning it’s made with remnant fabric by sewers who have creative control over its look—no two are alike!

 
 


 

In the Quechua language, Allpa means earth, terrain, the elements, land and the sea. We saw this name fitting for our new travel pack, as the adventurous spirit that pushes us to get out, explore, and do good in the world is the driving ethos behind Cotopaxi.

At its core, the Allpa Travel Pack is the result of years spent traveling, testing, and refining our proven-in-the-wild Cotopaxi designs. We took this real-world feedback and funneled it into a backpack format, knowing that the Allpa would be directed to those of us who prefer the support and comfort provided by backpacking packs’ harness systems. Having contoured shoulder straps, a proper hip belt, sternum strap, and fully padded airmesh back panel as its foundation serves several key purposes. First, it eliminates the bulky roller wheels, hard bottoms, and telescoping handles plaguing many “travel bags,” and second, it ensures your gear remains supported via the system we adopted from our load-toting backpacking packs. Additionally, if your pack is physically strapped to your body, security is heightened while moving through crowded areas compared to hand-held duffels and roller bags.

When Cotopaxi first launched, we built an in-house program that would give us the flexibility to research, develop, and produce short runs of experimental product. That was the beginning of Cotopaxi Labs. Today, the Labs project gives us an opportunity to develop products that perfectly fit the crowdfunding model and allows us to reach a broader outdoor audience.

FAQ

I’m leaving for some amazing adventure in August, can I get my backpack before then?

Unfortunately, no. July units have already been sold to the earliest backers and our next shipment will arrive in September. Your pack will be delivered in the date estimated in your perk.

Is the Allpa Waterproof?

No, the Allpa is water resistant. While the TPU material that covers the majority of the pack is technically waterproof, there are seams which make it not waterproof. That’s why we’ve included a rain cover with each Allpa.

What size laptop does the Allpa fit?

Any 15 inch laptop should fit comfortably.

Can we expect to see more Allpa colors in the future?

Yes, but for this Indiegogo campaign Black and Blue are the two choices.

Will I get to select the colors for my Batac 16L Daypack?

The Batac 16L Daypack will arrive to your door a total surprise. That’s the beauty of the Del Día colorway. To learn more about the remnant fabric used and how we are working with the sewers to give them creative control, check out this video

Will you be selling the Batac separately?

Yes, we will eventually have it online at cotopaxi.com and in our retail store.

I accidentally chose the wrong color Allpa. How do I change it?

Want to change the color of your Allpa? You'll be able to change your color is during the survey that will come at the end of the campaign. We keep an eye on our inventory to know how many packs we’re able to offer with each perk, but know there will be some that may change their mind in the end in terms of color. If you have any questions, please email us at llamas@cotopaxi.com. For FAQ’s on claiming perks, please see https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/526766-How-do-I-claim-a-Perk-.
