story:
NOW On SALE at 
MoonlitFlyFishing.com
 

 

Moonlit Fly Fishing Guarantees the that you will receive your perk (fly rod) just like if your ordered it off our website.

You can back the campaign more than once to get multiple rods.

 

 

We Love Fiberglass Fly Rods

From early on, fiberglass fly rods have been a passion of Moonlit Fly Fishing. The deep flex of these rods allow us to slow down, letting the rod do most of the work for us so we can enjoy the nature around us and the rhythm of the rod.  We also love the smooth casting action and light  delicate presentation that a great glass rod gives us.   

Just like with our furled leaders we love the history and tradition that fiberglass has, AND just like our Moonlit leaders we have found new material blends and fine tuned tapers that take these old traditional products to a modern upgraded hi-performance products. 

 

Why Our Glass Rods?

An Old Glass Feel with a Modern Twist
Our NEW Lunar Series of S-Glass rods have been designed to have an old glass feel but lighter weight with a bit faster action, we have been able to do this with today's new age advanced fiberglass materials and the expertise of our rod designer.

Fast Recovering Tip
One thing we don't like in many glass rods is an overly soft tip that robs your casting energy, and give you arm fatigue. We designed the Lunar rods to have a fast recovering tip that eliminates over oscillation so the rod's casting energy goes straight into your line without the wobble.

Progressive Taper with Reserved Power
The progressive action allows you to make smooth accurate short to medium casts but it also has a lot of reserved power to bomb the line out there when needed.

 

 

Excellent Roll Casts
The Lunar rods with their deep rod flex are also excellent at performing accurate roll casts.

Great Hook Sets
The Lunar S-Glass rods are also stiff enough to give you a great hook set and has enough backbone to fight fish effectively but elastic enough to bend all the way into the handle if needed.

Compact 4 Piece Rods
All the Lunar rods are a 4 piece which compacts down great for traveling and backpacking.

Several Sizes to Choose From
The Lunar rods will come in sizes 2wt, 3wt, 4wt, 5wt, 6wt, 7wt, and 8wt giving you many options to fit your wants and needs. Each size will be a different color:

  • 8wt - 8ft 6in light blue
  • 7wt - 8ft 6in maroon
  • 6wt- 8ft 2in orange
  • 5wt - 8ft blue
  • 4wt - 7ft 6in red
  • 3wt - 6ft 8in light brown
  • 2wt - 6ft 6in green

Bold But Classy
These rods are bold colors like the glass rods people have loved with a nicely done white accent near the handle. The finish and classy wraps are about as good as it gets from a factory produced rod, we paid attention to the details. This is not just a rod that will love to use but a rod that well stand out visually.

 

 

Lifetime Warranty
One thing we do differently in the glass world is offer an easy lifetime warranty. Instead of making you ship your rod into us for repairs, for a $45 warranty fee we send the replacement parts right to you, so you are back to fishing faster.

Back By a Great Brand, MOONLIT Fly Fishing
You have probably seen our brand around social media quite a bit, we have a large following of customers that love to use our products. We are well know for the BEST performing furled leaders on the market and excellent customer service, as well as a great offering of quality barbless hooks loved by many pro fly tyers. We will stand behind this new series of fiberglass fly rods just like we do all of our products and we think you will love this rod series.

Heavily Tested & Approved by Many Fly Anglers
Our prototype rods have been heavily tested by our great ambassadors in all kinds of water and all kinds of fish. The Lunar rods have also traveled abroad several times to Belize, Alaska and more. They have been tested by people who have lots of experience fishing fiberglass and also those who, up till now, mostly fished graphite rods. All the feedback has praised these rods for their performance and enjoyment in all the experiences and situations. 

We have also taken them to many fly fishing expos and let potential customers and fly fishing experts test them out and received excellent feedback about how they cast and look.

 

Some Reviews:

Travis Jones
"I’ve been fly fishing now for more than 30 years, and guiding for over 10.  During that time I’ve owned rods that ranged anywhere from a couple hundred dollars all the way up to the thousand dollar rigs. When I wad asked to test out the Lunar glass rods by Moonlit I was eager to see what this glass rod could do. This rod surprised me from the moment I laid my hands on it.  Not only a beauty to look at, but it recovers quickly, is super forgiving, and is extremely accurate. This rod handle anything and anyone I put on it.  In my role as a fly fishing guide I get lots of brand new or fairly new fly fisherman and woman who want to learn more about the sport.  I have no problem putting one of these rods in their hands.  The load of the rod as it casts is easy to feel and I watched as it changed beginning anglers into intermediate with abilities to hit some casts even advanced anglers have trouble making.  I watched anglers who were struggling to make 25 foot casts with their expensive graphite rod, make 75+ foot casts with the 3wt Lunar during practice sessions.  The change was that they could feel the rhythm of the cast with the Lunar.  With the range of glass rods available from 2wt to 8wt, the rod is capable of handing anything you want to throw with it to. From delicate dry fly presentations to hefty, meaty streamers it can handle them all.  I can’t wait for these rods to hit the market because I know I’ll have a couple in my bag of tricks."

 

Paul Shurtleff 
"The old days of heavy, flimsy fiberglass fly rods are a thing of the past with a warm welcome of the new Lunar Glass fly rods by Moonlit Fly Fishing. These new fly rods are a stunning addition to the already fabulous lineup of quality Moonlit Fly Fishing products. The 5wt Lunar Glass fly rod I used is a smooth casting, lightweight fly rod that presented delicate dry flies accurately. It’s distinctive white badging gives it a nice retro effect which reminds the user of its tradition. It has enough power for longer casts yet is more forgiving than faster graphite rods and it can handle large fish just as easily. The action of the Lunar Glass rod is fast for a fiberglass rod but soft enough to protect fine tippets. It’s cast loading/shooting is very predictable which inspires casting confidence. The performance of the 5wt Lunar Glass rod is only matched by its beautiful blue color, which almost glows in the sunlight."

 

Chris Cheney
"Just a quick note to say how much I enjoyed the opportunity to check out the Lunar rods. These rods are truly amazing. My first chance to use one was fishing with a great friend in Colorado, where after using a couple of our other rods that morning, I was able to get my hands on the Lunar 5wt. The fact is that my skill level puts me in the novice category and my back cast in particular, could use some help. The feel of this Lunar rod was very different from any other I had used and it very quickly became a lot of fun to cast and fight fish on. The action when fighting fish felt great and the bend in the rod made for some great moments on the river. Where I really enjoyed exploring these rods was at the Fly Fishing Rendezvous in Denver, when you graciously invited me to try some casting. I ended up casting the 2wt, 3wt, 4wt and 6wt and they were all amazing. I have to admit that I absolutely love the 2wt rod in particular. What I noticed right away with all of the Lunar rods is that my back cast began to slow down as I used these rods. It seemed to help me to slow down in a way that made my casts more accurate. This didn’t seem forced, or as if I was fighting the rod at all. Instead, it felt easier and more natural than what I have experienced with other rods. It really was relaxing and smooth, taking less effort to get a good back cast producing accurate long casts over and over was the result. It felt really good to be casting that well. What I can say is that I believe you have created an amazing product that I am very excited to have another opportunity to use. The Lunar rods are simply amazing and something that any fly fishing fanatic should take a good look at."

 

Jeremy Peace (Aka Gemstatefisherman)
"I had the opportunity to take the Moonlit Lunar 8wt and 7wt  out for a test drive this year late winter.  It was a very windy day on the water blowing like crazy making the river run in reverse was single digit temperatures that day.  So as you could imagine it was less than favorable conditions but still pursued and proceeded to fish the lunar which impressed me right away was able to launch smaller streamers 2.5" into head winds 50+ feet without much effort in the unrelenting wind.  I was very surprised at how well it threw the line.  First fish was a healthy 23" rainbow that had some shoulders and pulled like a train. The rod felt great you could really feel it working for you helping keep the thrashing head under control helping keep that hook set. Went awhile without touching another fish so switched up to a bigger heavier streamer to drop it further down the water column had to fish slow and the fish were not striking like they were earlier it went to a very subtle take, this is where the rod surprised me the most, that very subtle grab I felt just the lightest nic/bump and that rod translated that to my hands very well very sensitive. "

 

Clark Janke
"The lunar S glass rod is fantastic!!! I got to fish the red 4wt rod and cast very smooth. What I love about this rod is that you have the touch and flexibility of a glass rod but it feels like it has a little bit of fast action to it. Because if this I found I could cast long distances and land the fly very softly. I just love the feel of this rod. It’s an amazing glass rod! Amazing work Moonlit Fly Fishing!"

 

Mike Carlson (from Pioneer Anglers in Alpine Wyoming)
video review

 

 

Why We Need Your Help

As a small guy in a big industry the price bringing out a whole line of rods is costly and risky, even when you have a great product that people love. We have taken a huge risk in investing in this new series of Lunar S-GLASS rods. Your highly discounted pre-purchase of these rods through this campaign will give us the funds needed before our final production payment is due. These funds will lower that risk and allow us to work on more innovative products that you will love in the future.

Thank you for supporting the expansion of Moonlit Fly Fishing’s great products.

When Will They Ship?

The first shipment of Moonlit Lunar Glass Rods is scheduled to arrive near the end of July and the rods will ship out early August.

 

Learn More About Moonlit Fly Fishing

Website      Facebook      Instagram

story:
Story

XD Design is a proud Dutch brand born and raised on crowdfunding.

It was the year 2016. Our Bobby Anti-theft Backpack campaign was about to launch and we were nervous but excited at the same time. In the end, we could have never predicted a better outcome. It was a huge success and ever since, we have launched five other campaigns, had over 50.000 backers and interacted with thousands of customers and faithful followers from all over the world.

Known for our innovative, everyday travel-wear and for being the leaders in sustainability, we managed to make a name for ourselves by combining style and safety like no other. The XD Design concept is to encourage our community to move around safely while staying organized and well connected.

Today, we are once again extremely happy to introduce to you, the all new XD Design Flex Foldable Trolley & XD Design Flex Gym bag. Anti-theft, sustainable and, above all, flexible in shape and usage.

Learn more about these revolutionary new products bellow:

 

 
Flexible in shape and usage
One bag - lots of possibilities
Sustainable and conscious buying
 
 

The inner-support board reinforces the trolley when it is unfolded.

Pack Smart

The organizing board stores small items and compresses your clothes with adjustable webbings and a magnetic Fidlock click system.

 

 

 

 

PASSPORT HOLDER

The XD Design passport holder keeps your valuables handy and protected. 

Keep your passport safe from skimming in the RFID protected pocket and your boarding passes within reach in the front pocket with magnetic closure.  What's special about this passport case is that you can also use it as a phone stand to watch your favorite videos while traveling. The 3 in 1 storage space inside allows you to use this holder also as a wallet and phone pouch. 

Made from recycled materials

Fits up to 5.5" cell-phone.

Dimensions: 12.8 x 2.0 x 19 cm

 

 

 

TECH POUCH

Whether for storing cables, everyday gear, or travel essentials. This  Tech Pouch will keep your items neatly organized and easy to find, letting you pack more into a smaller space. Elastic accessory loops keeps items like mouse, pens, tools, SD cards and batteries always within reach. The external magnetic pocket functions as a storage for money or important documents such as a passport.

Made from recycled materials.

Dimensions: 290 g | 29 x 3 x 21 cm | 1,5 liters

 

 

PACKING CUBE

Rest assured that your clothes will remain well-organized and easy to find. The Packing Cube offers the possibility to compress your clothes, saving space in your bag or luggage. Packing has never been that easy! A perfect fit for the Flex Foldable Trolley.

Made from recycled materials.

Dimensions: 210 g | 25 x 10 x 37 cm | 10 liters

 

 

TOILETRY BAG

Keep personal items in order with this toiletry bag. This perfect fit for the Flex Gym bag will help you to store all liquid toiletries when on your way to the gym. With a stowable hook and inside pockets you will easily reach everything you need.

Made from recycled materials.

Dimensions: 160g | 24 x 7 x 15.55 cm | 2.3 liters

 

 

INSULATED WATER BOTTLE LEAK PROOF

Powder coated double wall vacuum insulated bottle. The bottle has a 2-in-1 lid with filter, which is perfect for tea or water. Standard mouth opening, ideal for drinking and adding ice cubes. The XD design water bottle is built to last and combines well with the Flex Gym bag.

Be sustainable and substitute plastic water bottles for this reused metal bottle.

Dimensions: 27,5 x 7,3 cm | 600ml

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

About us

 

We design Smart Everyday Travelwear.

XD Design is a proud Dutch brand with a  presence in over 50 countries and connections to over 3.000 retailers worldwide.

Our journey started with the creation of our design Studio in Shanghai that is run by ambitious in-house designers from all over the world.

But our brand, like many other success stories, started on crowdfunding. It was the year 2016 and the launch of our Bobby Anti-theft Backpack kicked off on a high note. Since then, we launched 5 more campaigns, we have had over than 50.000 backers on crowdfunding platforms, thousands of customer interactions and new followers on social media.

As our following massively grew, we wanted to make sure we never lost sight of what's important to our company, our customers and the environment.

Our products are designed to help our community to go about their day in a safe but functional way – allowing everyone to feel more connected and organized, despite time, distance or place. 

Also engraved in our DNA is sustainability. We move with the utmost responsibility towards our planet by using the best materials and packaging available on the market.

Safe – Connected – Organized - Responsible

XD Design 

 

 

 

Warranty

We stand by our products and offer a 2 year warranty.

Our customer support team is available through e-mail (bobby@xd-design.com), via live chat on our website (www.xd-design.com) and of course through the message board here on Indiegogo.

We will always make sure to be of service for any questions or issues you might have.

 

Customs & Duties

We will do our utmost best to prevent any additional costs, but please keep in mind that applicable duties/VAT are the sole responsibility of the backer and not of our team.

Our prices do not include VAT, GST or other country taxes. 

Unfortunately we also cannot mark orders as gifts or samples, as this is illegal.

We have absolutely no control over the additional duties/VAT that may or may not be charged in your country. If you are unsure whether or not you will be charged duties/VAT at the time of receiving your order, please get in touch with your local post office for more information.

There is also a handy tool online available to calculate these costs. Please note that this is an external online partner, so we cannot be held accountable for the differences between what is provided on the website with the actual costs. Link:  https://www.simplyduty.com/import-calculator/

The bags will be shipped from China. If you are required to pay any extra duties you will receive an e-mail/mail from your local Customs Authorities requiring extra payment. Only when the payment is completed, the order will be further processed and finally delivered.

 

Patent & Copyright

Copyright by Xindao B.V. Rijswijk (The Netherlands). Xindao B.V. is the brand owner of XD Design.

All rights reserved. No part of this work, nor of the information laid down herein and/or derivable here from and/or developed in connection herewith, may be reproduced or used in any form or by any means without the prior written permission of Xindao.

Worldwide Design & Utility Patent are owned by XD Design.

 

Risks and challenges

Of course there are always risks and challenges with the launch of a new product. However, since this is already our 3rd campaign on Indiegogo, we are thrilled to say that all of the most important details are in order. In our last crowdfunding campaign, all backpacks were sent out successfully to all backers within 2 months . Our survey showed that 97% of all backers were happy with the delivery service and customer support they received. This is exactly what we will strive for and what makes it all worth it.

Thank you for your continuous support and for believing in us!

story:
Zero light pollution, Milky Way views and complete oneness with nature in your own clear bubble room.

Bubble Hotels is only 2 to 3 hours from LA, Vegas and Phoenix and this desert oasis is the perfect weekend getaway. It isn’t just accommodations—it’s an experience in nature. 

Slumbering under the stars has been reserved for campers, until now. At Bubble Hotels, you sleep smack dab under a blanket of stars (and under a cozy comforter). 

Snuggle up in your crystal-clear, air conditioned bubble and take turns spotting constellations like Orion and Gemini, or embrace feeling small under the vast Milky Way. 

On especially clear nights, you can even see Andromeda Galaxy, no telescope necessary!

5,000 feet above sea level, Joshua Tree has long been world-famous for its unmatched stargazing, air clarity, and freedom from light pollution. The weekend warrior favorite is known as a trendy backdrop for influencers and engagement photoshoots, but it can be the tranquil retreat you need to reset and reconnect with yourself.

Calling all stargazers, nature lovers, adventurers & photographers! You could be among the first guests to sleep under the stars in the most comfortable way possible—in your own bubble with a queen-size bed, private bathroom and air conditioning. 

Located just 5 minutes from Joshua Tree National Park, Bubble Hotels lets you trade your routine for a nature experience in the desert.

This exclusive escape will have ten bubble units for guests to experience nature first.

Camping can be amazing, but it isn’t exactly a stress-free getaway. It requires a lot of preparation, and you’re at the mercy of Mother Nature.

 

Preserving Joshua Tree is at the heart of this project and we don’t want to take outside investment from corporate developers that don’t care about the environment like we do. That’s why our build plan is mindful, sustainable and local.

Visiting a new place isn’t always enough to snap you out of work mode and into tranquility. Bubble Hotels is equipped with relaxation-inducing amenities to make your OOO message count.

 

The Bubble Hotels property is specially designed to give you the perfect balance of privacy and socialization. Enjoy your private patio with a good book or dip in the hot tub, or head to the community area for socializing.

 

Bubble Hotels in Joshua Tree is the perfect setting to decompress, reconnect with nature, and experience the desert in a way you never have before. Think desert serenity, millions of stars and zero stress.

Some of the most notable stargazing opportunities include:

  • Winter Solstice with sunsets as early as 4:30 pm!
  • The bright star Arcturus in Spring
  • Perseid Meteor Shower in mid-August
  • Andromeda Galaxy & the Great Square of Pegasus in Fall
  • Constellations like Orion, Gemini, Taurus, Canis Major and Leo

In order to lock in your spot as a future guest at Bubble Hotels Joshua Tree, you must back our live Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign by selecting the Perk for how long you want to stay and paying that amount at that time—this will be the only place the payment for your Stay is made.

To back our crowdfunding campaign so that you can reserve your stay when we open booking, simply:

At the end of the campaign, we’ll email you a confirmation survey with all of the information necessary to book the dates of your stay through our website (booking opens in January with first dates available in April).

Your reservation does not expire, so if you don’t know your dates immediately, you can book in the future.

Longer Stay = Earlier Access to Available Dates

Bubble availability is limited and dates will sell out fast! We’re prioritizing booking by Access Level and Length of Stay so the sooner you back the campaign and the longer your stay, the earlier access you’ll have on our website to book, meaning the more options you’ll have for dates!

If you are the first person to book a 7-night Stay, you will have first access to confirm your dates. Priority will then go through everyone who booked at that length of Stay, with the next priority going to the next length of stay and so on in sequential order.

 

Packages to stay at a Bubble Hotels' in Joshua Tree for two nights with availability starting in March of 2021 include:

story:
Short Summary

Imagine a mommy friend taking you by the hand and walking you around Paris, Chicago or Tokyo. She would know all the hidden spots for kids. Restaurants, playgrounds and stores only locals know.

Welcome To The Bébé Voyage App.

Over the last few years, we have created a community of parents around the world who exchange tips on hotels, packing needs, flight toys, destinations, sites, restaurants, adventures and so much more. We are ready to take this community to the next level.

We want to empower children to be curious, open-minded, global citizens. We want them to become lifelong travelers. And we want them, in turn, to build a better, more peaceful world.

This is about making your life easier and your children’s lives richer.

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to raise $10,000 in one week to support the creation of the app in collaboration with Crumbdrop and their developers.

Our vision is to create an inclusive, dynamic community that everyone can benefit from. Can you help? As a thank you, you will get early access to the app and amazing thank you gifts from companies that share the same values as Bébé Voyage.

With such an engaged community, we are hoping to get 100% participation from our members!

Check out our various donation levels which include thank you gifts from some of Club Bébé Voyage's favorite brands.

Bébé Voyage only partners with brands that we know and trust. This year, the following companies have been generous enough to offer thank you gifts: Jetkids Bedbox, Dr. Steve Silvestro's Meditation for Parents, Veronic Travel, Good Prints, Plane Pal, SlumberPod, Regalo Baby, BabyQuip, Lugabug, Noleo baby care products, SoaPens, Simply for Flying, and Keep 'Em Quiet.

Our Vision For The Bébé Voyage Trails App:

The number one question Bebe Voyage users ask each other is – what can I do with my little one when I get to my destination?

What gets us excited is to see the number of replies, 50, 100, sometimes more. Our community is extremely active, with 10,000 of the 13,000 Bébé Voyage users in the Club posting or commenting often, sharing itineraries, tips and ideas based on their respective experiences.

But this information gets lost in the social media fray. So we thought – how can we best capture this valuable information – and the huge amount of it – in a way that is useful to our users? How can we best organize what is already being shared in a way that is searchable for our users?

Can we, in the end, build a platform where like-minded parents can connect with each other in a more meaningful way?

This will be an extremely powerful platform that will change the way parents explore the world with their children. And we need you to make it happen!

In October, we launched 18 family-friendly trails in partnership with Crumbdrop, a technology platform that generates instant animated slideshows of destinations and neighborhoods with interactive maps that you can save and share.

Using the money we raised last year, we were able to build 18 pilot trails to test the concept. The feedback has been amazing with many members eager to build their own trails.  In addition, we have seen a huge increase in website traffic over the last few months.

We now want to continue our partnership with Crumbdrop to customize their technology for Bébé Voyage’s needs. We want to make it possible for all traveling families to create and share their adventures on the go.

Risks & Challenges

Your donation will go towards funding the development of a Bébé Voyage app. This investment does carry some risk with it and does not guarantee that an app will be built. Obviously we hope to the contrary, but we just wanted to give you a heads up.

 

Other Ways To Help

We know and trust that you are supporting us the best you can in whatever way is possible. A few other ideas that will also help us:

1. Use the Indiegogo share tools to help spread the word!

2. Share our crowdfunding social media posts with your friends and/or tag them. 

3. Make sure you follow us on Instagram (@bebe.voyage) and like the crowdfunding posts.

4. Invite your friends to Club Bébé Voyage and let them know we are working on creating an app!

story:
About

Hey Indiegogo! We're Oru Kayak. A few years back, we invented the origami kayak – a craft with the strength and performance of a hardshell boat, the portability of a suitcase, and a mind-blowingly cool way to transform between the two.

We believe in a world with more spontaneous adventure-  the freedom to get outside and hit the water anytime, anyplace. Now, we're taking this to a whole new level with our most revolutionary kayak yet - the Inlet. 

 

We’ve done plenty of innovating over the years- we’ve introduced four models for different paddlers and types of water. Now we’re putting all that practice to work- to make the most accessible kayak in the world.

 

To do this, we had to start from the bottom. Let’s walk you through it.  

 

New Origami Fold Pattern

We wanted to push all of Oru’s key attributes- portability, weight, foldability- to the absolute max. Instead of a suitcase-sized box, what about a handbag size? Could we get it under 20 pounds? How many steps could we cut out of the assembly process?

And of course, it had to be a blast in the water- solid, stable and lively. Oh, and it had to be sleek and beautiful- we think a 10 foot kayak should still have sweet lines and curves.

To do all of this, we had to go back to the basics of origami- and develop a SHINY. NEW. FOLD PATTERN. Every crease was designed from scratch, through dozens of paper and cardboard models. Every fold had to be designed to nest and fit perfectly, to eliminate wasted space and make the smallest box possible.

When we started the project, we had no idea if all of this was possible. But we kept pushing to make something AMAZING.  We hope it’ll kindle your sense of adventure, get you to your happy place, and just plain knock your socks off. 

Time to Recreate

The Inlet makes the water accessible, simple and easy – for everyone. It's designed for flat water, with features to fit paddlers of all ages and experience levels.  As of now, we'd recommend max weight capacity topping out around 275lbs and max paddler height around 6'2", depending on individual proportions.

*Some of these features are being fine-tuned and may change slightly from the final product.

Store it, Transport it

OK, this part is extra exciting. The Inlet folds down into a box WAY smaller than our existing kayaks. For those new to Oru, this full-sized, hardshell kayak will fold down and carry like a small suitcase.  In box form, the Inlet is 42" long x 19" tall x 10" wide.

 

 

Throw a few in the trunk of your car, check one on a plane with nary a glance from the airlines, tuck it under your couch – the world is your tetris!  No matter where you live, how much space you do or don’t have, the Inlet fits. To make our point, we’ve done some stash-testing for you. Note: no roof rack pictured. 


And if you’re the backcountry type, our super-comfy custom pack lets you trek to remote water that’s never floated a boat. How cool is that?

Light as a feather, stiff as a board

Less material + fewer loose parts + streamlined fold pattern = LESS WEIGHT.

This kayak only weighs 20lbs. That’s light enough for paddlers of all ages and muscle sizes to carry, pass, heck – toss this kayak as they please.

Assembly

The IKEA-challenged of you may ask: OK, how hard is it really to assemble?  The Inlet has just a few loose components to put in place and only 3 assembly steps. At most, you’ll need 5 minutes to put this kayak together. No sweat, no hex wrenches.

3-Step Assembly: 


Under 5 minutes from start to finish

Check out the real-time assembly below. 

 

Price

We know it matters to you, and it matters to us. We think “accessible” should mean “affordable”. We’ve spent the last two years overhauling our production process and have gone as far as building our own facility in Mexico and have become vertically integrated in order to fully control processes and our end product. And as we’ve worked on the Inlet, we’ve been maniacal about reducing the costs of new parts through clever design and sourcing.

But that doesn’t mean we’re cheap! We are still committed to using the highest quality materials and giving you an outstanding experience- we’ll never skimp on that. Our goal is to give a great value for a great product- especially here on Indiegogo, where you’ve supported us from the beginning. Our estimated MSRP will be $899. We're excited to launch the Inlet with extra sweet discounts and gear packages for our backers. 

The New Pack:

Because this new model packs up so much smaller than our other kayaks, we redesigned our pack to fit and added some sleek new features. Zip your Inlet into the new pack, clip the padded waist belt, and let your hips carry the easy 20lbs. Free up your hands and hike your boat up narrow rugged trails, down steep steps, or just through the airport with ease. Our estimated MSRP will be $179.

Accessorize, Accessorize

In addition to this new pack, we also have an entire collection of kayaking accessories available on our website that should meet almost all of your paddling needs! One item that you'll absolutely need is a paddle, so we've packaged our Oru's four-piece paddle with the Inlet in a couple of our rewards packages. Like our kayaks (and unlike many other paddles), it breaks down small enough to fit almost anywhere.

Oru Paddle 

FEATURES:

  • Lightweight, reinforced fiberglass shaft
  • Molded ABS plastic blades
  • Marine-grade stainless steel connector buttons
  • Completely adjustable length and blade pitch (feathering) 


SPECIFICATIONS:

  • Blade Material: ABS
  • Blade Size: 44cm x 16cm
  • Blade Shape: Asymmetrical
  • Shaft Material: Fiberglass
  • Shaft Shape: Straight
  • Shaft Size: Adjustable length 220-230cm
  • Feather: Adjustable ferrule 0-90 degrees
  • Breakdown: 4-Piece
  • Control: Right or left hand
  • Weight: 2.75lbs (1.25kg)
  • Weight: 2.55 lbs
  • Adjustable length: 220-230 cm

Nice to meet you! We’ve been around for 7 years and have shipped 15,000+ boats. They’ve been paddled everywhere from the Arctic to the Caribbean, but we’re still finding new fans all over the world- glad you found us! In case the concept of an origami kayak is a little confusing...read on! We’ll go over some Oru basics. 

Material

All of our kayaks are made from a custom extruded, UV-treated plastic called OruPlast™. The material is a thicker custom-made version of the same plastic that postal service bins are made out of – and those things take a beating. All of our kayaks are rated to 20,000 folds, and while we recommend treating your Oru like a fiberglass boat, these boats are made to withstand any flatwater adventure. 

A new category

Our kayaks are hard to categorize, but we're okay with that – we don't like labels. We're not an inflatable, a rigid kayak, a skin-on-frame – we're origami! Oru Kayaks combine the best features of all of these categories to make a boat that's portable and durable without sacrificing performance (*cough* inflatables). It's all thanks to origami and our technology.  

Kayak comparison

Not sure what kind of kayak you need? Check out where the Inlet falls on our lineup, and head to the comparison chart on our website to compare all of the specs side-by-side.


The Reviews Are In

Of course, we love the Inlet, but when we call it Our Most Revolutionary Kayak Ever we don't expect you to take our word for it. A few months ago we shared an early prototype with journalists to receive feedback – *spoiler alert* they loved it! Click the video above to watch reviews from Gear Patrol, Technically Katie and Gear Junkie for yourself.  

 


OK, that about covers it! Now let's talk about why we're doing all this. 

Our mission is to connect people to nature and to make the water more accessible. To reach more people, and introduce more new folks to the joys of paddling, we realized years ago that we needed a boat as simple and easy as this one. But we weren't ready until now.  

After months of engineering, paper-folding, paddling, beta testing, team design reviews, we're so ready we can hardly wait. And we're taking it straight to you, our community. You launched our company right here on Indiegogo, and have stuck with us through four more crowdfunding campaigns- we're eternally grateful! 

We're eager to get this wonder of origami design into your hands, and out on the water. With your help, we’ll be able to purchase the dies, molds, materials, and factory equipment required to mass-produce this product. Show your support, get your own Inlet, and help us do this thing. THANK YOU!

 

Join the Oru Community 

When you buy an Oru Kayak, you join our family. The folks that make up our community are some of the most adventurous, loyal, creative, and enthusiastic paddlers out there. Some of our most passionate owners have joined a crew we call Oruvangelists.  Our inboxes and social media accounts are flooded with photos and stories of our owners’ latest Oru adventures. We’re inspired every day by all the ways and places people use their boats and we love to follow along on Instagram, Facebook and Youtube.

A kayak that fits into YOUR life

At Oru, our customers are made up of all different types of people who live very different lives. It's one of the beautiful things that makes our community so diverse.  We designed the Inlet to fit into as many lives as possible and solve as many universal challenges that come with owning a kayak. Check out these mini-features of the four storylines we told for this campaign.

 

The Retired Explorers:

 

The Suburban Adventurers 

 

The Backcountry Trailblazers

 

Urban Dwellers:

story:
Partner with the Eastern States Cup and promote the future of North American racing at World Cup events. The Eastern States Cup North American Downhill Team provides direct access to Junior World Cup events, but these athletes need your support to get there. Travel costs are as steep as the world-class tracks these riders will encounter and they may not make it to the starting gate without your support.

The Eastern States Cup North American Downhill Team is the first all-junior squad to receive full trade team status from the UCI. Nine teens from the U.S. and Canada will be racing for this team at World Cups and ProGRTs across the globe this coming season. The North American Downhill Team is the brainchild of George Ulmer, founder and owner of the popular Eastern States Cup enduro and downhill series. Ulmer is a huge champion of the East Coast racing and sees this as an important next step for the sport: “I really want to give back and feel this is a good way to do that. I hope to make this a long term venture as it will help the future of junior downhill racing by providing direct access to Junior World Cup events.”

The team members have been drawn from the ranks of the Eastern States Cup Category 1 Juniors and offer unlimited potential. They are all podium threats in their category and their times often place them high in the pro ranks as well.  Team members are responsible for all logistics and costs of attending events, including, but not limited to, travel costs and registration fees. Your support helps offset the $4000 per rider per event travel costs and makes it possible for team members to race at more than just the one North American event to be held at Mont-Sainte-Anne this summer. 

How can you help? Check out the Perks available and help us spread the word about this Indiegogo Campaign.  Interested in getting more involved and sponsoring the team? Contact George Ulmer at EasternStatesCup@hotmail.com

***PLEASE NOTE: The ESC NADT will email you at campaigns end for sizing***

story:
The App

 

 

 

 

 

Find The Perfect Trail

The app will include a trail search function and provide hiking trail details like; descriptions, difficulty, directions, elevation profiles, trail area, length, completion times, and trail type.

 

 

 

 

 

City-Wide Challenges

This section will be used to help motivate our users to be active and healthy in their day to day lives. How? There will be 4-5 "Healthy Living" campaigns throughout the year that a user can register for. The campaign will last under a month and in that time the user will try to complete assigned achievements for points (ie. 25 pts to hike 1 km). At the end of the campaign the user will be either awarded a prize or have the ability to put their points toward discounts at local businesses.

 

 

 

 

800 km of Trails

The app is being developed in the city of Thunder Bay and already has 800 km of trails from the US Minnesota border to the township of Nipigon. In the coming months, the app will be expanded to the rest of Northwestern Ontario.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Offline Map Access

Safety is one of the app's main focuses, for that reason you will be able to use the app out of service or offline. The app will download map sections you are interested in hiking to your phones storage, then utilize its internal GPS.

 

 

 

 

Important Alerts and Notifications 

We want to make sure the user is as informed as possible, in order to do this we will be alerting you with banner or push notifications when there are important things you need to know. For example, if you are near something dangerous like a cliff we want you to know to be safe and careful. Also, private property is always an issue when hiking so we will have property boundaries marked. For a lot of our regulated areas there are rules (no off leash dogs or bikes) and trail etiquette you should know.

 

 

 

User Profiles

You will have the option to create a user profile that will allow you to track your progress by recording how many kilometres you've hiked and how much time you have spent on trails... even record and save hikes! This feature also focuses on connecting you with your friends or other hikers through sharing hikes or inviting others to join you on your adventures.

 

 


This mobile application will be the ultimate tool for both residents and visitors of Northwestern Ontario. We want everyone to be able to experience all the amazing outdoor recreation our area has to offer. No more wondering where you should hike, WAYfinder Trails & Recreation can guide you safely.

 

Timeline

The first phase of the WAYfinder Trails and Recreation mobile hiking application is currently being developed by a local media company in Thunder Bay, Ontario. Phase one will include building the apps "backbone" which is called the creator platform. This will allow us to manually input our data and update the information when needed. Most, but not all, of the above features will be included in the first phase development that will be available to the public in June 2018. Phase two will be our first update that will be completed 3-4 weeks following the first phase.

It is understood that the majority of coding for the project development is in Phase I. The remaining phases will allow for edits and interaction, personalization and community engagement. After Phase I, WAYfinder will enter trail data and begin troubleshooting

 

Our Goal

The goal of this Indiegogo campaign is to reach $10,000 in 30 days from the community we love. The team is confident in the need for this product and truly believe many people will benefit from it. This money will go directly towards the physical development of the mobile application. WAYfinder is working with Shout Media, who has the professional skillset and staff to deliver the best product possible. If they do not make the full goal of $10,000 every dollar will still go directly to the app. 

 

Our Story 

Katherine Couzelis and Graeme Saukko-Sved, the two founders of this community initiative, were both born and raised in Thunder Bay, Ontario. Being from opposite sides of town (Fort William/Port Arthur) they were able to combine their knowledge of the local trail systems to collect over 800 km of data. These two met through the forestry program at Confederation College two years ago. For a major GIS class project they were partners and that’s where it all began.

How did they come up with this idea?

Katherine had been tired of hearing all the scary stories her sister had about being lost on the local trails. Unfortunately, there is a lack of infrastructure focused on helping make the outdoors accessible and safe for everyone. This gave them their main focus of using this mobile application as a safety tool, since then they have established a few more key components they want to focus on; environmental stewardship, public health, and economic benefits.

story: Hi, the campaign is closed. Thanks for your support!
story_txt: Hi, the campaign is closed. Thanks for your support!

story:
We are a collective of doulas offering free of charge support to women who could not otherwise afford a doula. We believe all women deserve respectful, skilled support regardless of income or any other imaginary lines. Serving women without means to pay something of utmost importance to us. Indeed it is at the roots of who we are as doulas. In our opinion, the value of a doula's presence is not measurable in dollars and cents. However, In our money-centric world, there are monetary expenses: supplies, fuel, etc. 


In late September, Sarah, one of our doulas, will be riding the Great Allegheny Passage (GAP) which runs from Pittsburg, PA to Washington DC, about 335 miles. Aside from the fact that she likes to ride her bike, this will be a benefit ride for our collective and the beautiful women we support. We hope to raise a good bit of money to cover basic expenses that doulas encounter such as fuel, supplies, and educational materials. This money will go into an account that will be used for these doula-specific things.

We have a hopeful goal of $1000. Almost $3 per mile. If 335 people sponsored a mile we'd be there.

Thanks in advance for your generosity,

Love,
The Blue Ridge Doula Project


P.S.  If your'e unfamiliar with the word, doula, its an ancient greek word for woman slave, but has been revived to mean a someone knowledgable in childbirth that provides physical and emotional support, to women during pregnancy, birth, and postpartum. Contact us if you'd like more details or a clearer picture of a doula's role.

We believe all women deserve respectful, skilled support regardless of income or any other imaginary lines. Serving women without means to pay something of utmost importance to us. Indeed it is at the roots of who we are as doulas. In our opinion, the value of a doula's presence is not measurable in dollars and cents. However, In our money-centric world, there are monetary expenses: supplies, fuel, etc. In late September, Sarah, one of our doulas, will  be riding the Great Allegheny Passage (GAP) which runs from Pittsburg, PA to Washington DC, about 335 miles. Aside from the fact that she likes  to ride her bike, this will be a benefit ride for our collective and the beautiful women we support. We hope to raise a good bit of money to cover basic expenses that doulas encounter such as fuel, supplies, and educational materials. This money will go into an account that will be used for these doula-specific things. We have a hopeful goal of $1000. Almost $3 per mile. If 335 people sponsored a mile we'd be there. Thanks in advance for your generosity,Love, The Blue Ridge Doula ProjectP.S.  If your'e unfamiliar with the word, doula, its an ancient greek word for woman slave, but has been revived to mean a someone knowledgable in childbirth that provides physical and emotional support, to women during pregnancy, birth, and postpartum. Contact us if you'd like more details or a clearer picture of a doula's role.

story:
The perfect wallet companion

Our solid steel mirror is the size and shape of a credit card. It's lightweight and strong stainless steel. The perfect minimalist mirror for quick, discreet checkups.

Stainless steel forms an invisible Chromium oxide layer, giving it the appearance of a bare metal mirror surface.

This protects it from the elements as well as making the mirror surface an excellent thermal and solar reflector.

Have you ever needed a quick checkup while you're out?  Our solid steel mirror is the perfect solution!

It's the exact dimensions of a standard credit card, making it light, strong, portable and convenient.

At arm's length, it gives you a great viewing area. It can also be used as a beacon reflector in emergency situations.

There are no coatings or glass to break or chip off. This is a single piece of solid stainless steel.

Prop it up on your desk to get a view of what's behind you :)

 

Please pledge now and help us earn the funds we need to produce this wonderful mirror!

story:
Parking Simplified

Are you sick of driving around in circles looking for parking?  Are you frustrated coughing up your hard earned cash for parking tickets?  

DropSpot saves you time and money by connecting you with the availability information you need to find the most convenient parking spot in your area.  

How it works

The Social Platform

DropSpot harnesses the power of the social platform to allow drivers to share parking information to help the DropSpot community.  Sharing allows you to anonymously share when you plan on leaving your parking spot so other DropSpot users know when your spot will be available.  If you park at a metered spot, this feature also lets you keep track of when you time will run out avoiding expensive parking tickets.  At DropSpot, we believe in good karma.  Sharing is Caring.  

Our Story

As a student at the UMass Boston, our CEO and Co-Founder, Karl Sylnay, became frustrated with the parking situation on campus. He was constantly driving around in circles trying to find a parking spot. He became determined to come up with a solution to fix the parking problem. 

The Parking Problem

The current state of parking is inefficient and ineffective.  This is bad for environment and wastes precious time and money.  Below are some staggering facts to help put things in perspective:

Your Contribution

We have bootstrapped our way through the iPhone app development and initial launch phases but need your help to go the distance.  Whether you can donate $10 or $1,000, every dollar makes a difference,  We view you as part of our ever-growing community to help get DropSpot on it's feet!

Where Your Money is Going

  • Android app development
  • Marketing campaign
  • Growing membership of lot owners
  • Customer service support

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand if you don't have the money to contribute right now.  Here are some other ways you can help us out!

  • Download our app: https://appsto.re/us/xbgE9.i
  • Spread the words to your friends and family!

Our Core Team

  • Karl Sylnay                      CEO & Co-Founder
  • Isabel Fay                        CTO & Co-Founder
  • Stephane Jovin             Sales Director
  • Devon O'Brien               Marketing Director
  • Gustavo Bispo               Business Developer

story:
Overview

The Wrap Bag is the most functional garment bag that combines the casual versatility of a duffel with the wrinkle-free protection of a garment bag. Through this innovative bag, we support you to carry less and enjoy more of your life.

 

 

Compartment long enough to protect a suit or a dress.

On the bottom, there’s a wet/dry separation compartment. This is a really cool feature that allows you to store soiled clothes after a workout, or for storing liquids that have a tendency to leak.Zip-Up to Form a Duffel

The Wrap Bag is your solution to overbearing, bulky luggage. With dimensions of 22 x 13 x 9 inches, the Wrap Bag meets domestic and international carry-on standards.

Right Size to Carry When Cycling

There are generally two types of luggage people use for travel: the duffel or the roller. We found both to be bulky, constricting, and unable to offer a way of keeping your garments wrinkle-free.
We knew there had to be a better way.
That’s why we created The Wrap Bag.
Its 2-in-1 design offers you a garment-bag for suits or dresses and a duffel for more luggage, toiletries, and shoes. The water-resistant and wrinkle-resistant fabrics keep your clothes safe while looking sleek and comfortable.

Contact Us: 

Customer Service: service@travelinspira.com

story:
Hello everyone! We would like to introduce You to our Fantasy Village. Hope You like it!

This movie above is one of our promos for our games. 

How Fantasy Village started?

As kids, our gang used to escape to our base located in a nearby forest. There was a shack and earth lodge joined together by an underground tunnel and a pine tree with a seat for the guard. We surrounded the whole base with a fence of thorny bushes with a secret entrance. Everything was built by two boys and one girl, and we share only fond memories of the times we spent there.

Today, as adults, we still want to have as many fond memories as possible, so we invite you to a small village by the forest which we have funded and built with our father and a group of friends. It’s bigger than the first base, because we have grown, and continue building the base with a group of wonderful young people.  

Past and future

Even though the realisation of the living Fantasy Village idea seems distant, we have marked our goal and set the path and will certainly not go back. We have been following that path for the last two years, and with your help, we will be able to run along it to realise our and Your dreams. At the moment, the idea of a living village connects people of particular passions and talents. There are blacksmiths, craftsmen, fencing specialists, builders and writers among us. The founders watched with joy as the village grew – as the fort and first huts were surrounded by a palisade, and as a pond, bridge and a tavern appeared. We look forward to the nearest future when we will have six more huts, cultivable fields, fruit trees and pens for farm animals.

The living Village idea is about people living permanently in the huts, wearing costumes, keeping the Village’s atmosphere alive. They could work for the Village during the day, as tavern keepers, guards, farm workers, blacksmiths, or crafting items that could be sold. Evenings would be devoted to rest and integration at the tavern’s hearth. This would be the place where everyone could rest from the city noise and everyday problems, chill out and have a wonderful time with a group of friendly people.  

 Things got serious

We decided to post information about our Village online and the reaction exceeded our expectations. Within a week of the promotion start, a national information service published a reportage about our village, so the news about our project reached four million people. Dozens of people from all over Poland want to come to us and help with the building. The only thing we lack is money to buy materials and manage the project.

Fantasy Village will not be just one location, but a whole set of buildings, some a bit farther away but still retaining the fantasy atmosphere. There will be a port on the river San, a guard tower on a distant hill, elven ruins in the surrounding woods, a knights’ court, a tree top village and a rope park in one, and a system of trenches surrounding the village, that could be dwarven tunnels at the same time.

The village will become a theme park open to tourists, where the Village inhabitants would be providing services, working for the mutual gain. The tourists will be able to eat a meal, prove themselves in knights’ combat, or buy beautiful handcrafted items. We are aware, that we need a way to sustain our dream, so we created a business plan. Our income will come from selling handcrafted items and props, film productions, fantasy related exhibitions and shows, company events and parties such as weddings, birthdays etc.  

Why are we asking for money?

We decided to use crowdfunding for a number of reasons. The most prosaic one is that our current funds don’t allow us to develop the project as much as we would like to. We always need more resources, wood or time.

Another reason is our strong belief in the power of crowdfunding. It has helped to appreciate people with ideas and creative passions many times. That is why we want to show our Village to the world with the question – are we those people?

We noticed that the Fantasy Village is an inspiration for many people, especially those who feel overwhelmed by city life. We show them that the passion for hard work is enough to surround oneself with an amazing environment. Indiegogo gives us the opportunity to show our project to the world and we really hope you will like it. We want to spread the inspiration and hope that similar Villages will appear in other countries.  

The funds we receive will be reasonably managed and invested for the benefit of the village’s best development. We want to make sure that our product will be self-sufficient. All of the locations we are preparing will be included in the tourist product. We will constantly promote the village in Poland and the world with the help of two videoblogs, presenting the life of the villagers and the problems that medieval people faced. We will organise educational non-profit projects, especially for children, to teach them about literature and the medieval times. Those classes will be posted online both in Polish and English.  

By creating this campaign, we want to inspire as much as reaching our goal. If everyone who support our Village would give us a dollar, we would have a successful action. We understand that not everyone have finances to spare. If you are one of those persons you can stil help us. Please, contact us and help us other way or just share the word with your friends - we will be truly grateful!

What will You recieve?

There will be a huge book bound in leather with iron fittings in the Lord’s Room, the very heart of our Fort. It contains hand written sentences, both wise and merry, songs and stories of people from all over the world. The book of Founders will always remain in its honorary place, as a symbol of memory of all those who helped us with the building of our living village. In this book, each sponsor will receive a place, it’s size depending on the amount of contribution, from several sentences or half of the page to a whole page. We will write or draw whatever the sponsor wishes, it could be a golden sentence, a part of the favourite book, a story written by the sponsor of his or her portrait, a dedication for a loved person, or anything else. The whole book will be photographed in high resolution , page by page, so that everyone will be able to see it and read the thoughts of our Founders.

The sponsors who pays over $250 will receive another special symbol of our gratitude – we will create a wooden shield with a crest designed by the sponsor. The shield may feature a personal symbol, a logo of a club, personal dedication, or whatever the sponsor sees fit. The shield will be hanging on the wall in the fort or tavern. Signed with the sponsor’s name and city.

Each person who contributes more than 25$ will receive a digital album sent by email, with photos depicting our work on the Fantasy Village, the games that took place there and the building team.

Sponsor/patron?

If you are a company owner or a person with a lot of money, we would be happy to discuss higher contributions individually. We would certainly find a beautiful, magical way to repay the company of organisations for support.  

Would you like to have a Village like ours in your city?

The building of Fantasy Village that has been taking place for the last two years has provided us with a lot of experience. Having no support, we managed to create the know-how, building and functioning strategies for such a village. If you want a place like that to appear in your location, let us know, and we will send a person from out most experienced team to help establish the project.   

We're curious for Your feedback!

It's our first try with crowdfunding, so we are really anxious how it's gonna work. We would really like to read Your feedback and answer all the questions You have for us. We will answer all the questions in the comments section. We will also make a video just for indiegogo as soon as we will have a technical possibility. Hope to hear from You soon!

 

Check out the gallery for more photos from our Village!

Contact us by:

Comments on Indiegogo

Facebook.pl/wioskafantasy

wioskafantasy@gmail.com

story:
Hi, I am Olivia's grandfather, Jason Hoskins. Olivia and her mother both live with my wife and I and both have Neurofibromatosis.

Olivia is a vibrant, intelligent, very creative 7 year old with a brain tumor behind her right eye, it's called an Optic Glioma.

For the past several years since her diagnosis, we have been taking her to see and be treated by Dr. David Gutmann II, one of the formost experts on NF. He is based at The Childrens Hospital in St. Louis.

Olivia and her mother are totally dependant on our support for their daily living and medical care. Kelly, Olivia's mother has very painful external tumors over a good portion of her body and isn't able to be employed at this time.

We need help with travel expences to and from St. Louis for Olivia's treatments and testing. Currently, our appointments are scheduled quarterly.

These funds will go directly to travel expenses. We drive from Kansas City to St. Louis and back which is approximately 250 miles. Funds are needed for fuel and auto related needs. We schedule her appointments over two consecutive days so we stay two nights in a hotel. Food and lodging are a major part of the expense. Oh, and Olivia loves the water, so we try to find a reasonable hotel with a pool. Because we go so often, she likes to see or do something new each trip to make it fun, not just getting poked and prodded by doctors.

All funds raised will go towards travel expenses even if the entire goal isn't met.

Neurofibromitosis is a genetic disorder that causes tumors to grow in the nervous system, there is currently no cure.

We participate in local and national fundraisers every year for the NF Foundation. Proceeds are raised for research and developement of treatments and potential cures.

Like any parent or grandparent, we try to get Olivia the best treatment possible. We have limited resources due to recent job loss and injury. The words, Thank You, can't express the level of gratitude we feel towards those who would contribute. Knowing what kind of future is in store for Olivia makes me sad, but by Gods grace and the compassion of many, she will prosper.

 

Spread the word about Neurofibromatosis.

Look for fund-raisers in your area, educate yourself about this disorder and tell your friends and family the effect it has on children, their lives and their futures.

story:
See more at: www.TRAKknife.com

 

What is TRAK?

At less than 1/2 oz, TRAK is the perfect choice for individuals with an active lifestyle that need an ultra lightweight knife. TRAK is the perfect knife for those running alone, biking, hiking, camping or just walking your dog.  Regardless of the environment, TRAK can handle it!  We found that TRAK not only came in handy in a marine environment, but found ourselves wearing it on our daily runs.  With TRAK, you're never alone.

 

 

 

 

What makes TRAK unique is that you place your index finger in the retention hole and wrap you thumb and middle finger around it. This makes dropping or having TRAK slip out of your hands virtually impossible.  Easy to wear around your neck with our neck sheath set-up, carry it on your keys, or zip tie it to your gear, purse, or backpack.

 

 

Simply throw it around your neck for a run or on a key ring for everyday tasks.

 

 

 

 

 

Why Titanium?

TRAK is made from military grade titanium (6AL4V), which is the same material used in professional touring bikes, aviation, race cars, and even the SpaceX Falcon 9 rocket.  The benefit of titanium is it's ultra-light weight, twice as strong as its equivalent in steel, rust proof, corrosion proof, and non ferrous (no iron).  Titanium is even used in surgical implants for its harmonizing factor with the human body.

 

Will Not Rust or Corrode- Even in Salt Water!

 

Exposed to the elements (salt water, sweat, high humidity, dirt, etc), TRAK will not rust or corrode. 

 

Handcrafted in the USA

TRAK is 100% hand crafted in the USA.  The titanium is sourced in California and then sent to Texas where the blanks are cut out on a waterjet machine.  The raw TRAK cut-outs are then sent to our shop in Boston, MA where the cutting edge is hand ground.  From there we apply the following finishing treatments: stonewashing, bead blasting, color anodizing, final edge sharpening, tungsten carbide welded to edges, and hand stamped logos. 

We then move on to the Kydex thermoplastic retention sheaths, which are also made one at a time, by hand.

 

 

 

 

 

One Size Doen't Fit All:

 

TRAK will be offered in two different sizes.  We understand that one tool cannot fit everyone so we're offering two sizes: Medium and Large.  Please see below for specs.

 

 

 

TRAK is designed to fit your hand like a glove.  When you insert your index finger into the retention hole, the remaining fingers wrap around TRAK comfortably in their own finger holds.  This gives you a very secure, no slip grip.  As long as you keep your hand closed, TRAK will not fall out!   

 

 

Weight: .5 oz (14 grams) with sheath

 

 

Helpful Fit Tip: You can measure the diameter of your index finger with a string just above your knuckle to determine best fit.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Colors:

TRAK will be available in: Gold, Green, Natural, Bronze, Blue, and Purple

 

 

Sheath:

TRAK comes with a thermoplastic Kydex sheath.  This material is heated until soft and pliable and then press formed around TRAK.  Once cooled, Kydex will fit your knife like a custom made glove.  Kydex is waterproof, lightweight, retains its shape better than leather, and can last a lifetime.  The retention sheath has two eyelets at top, which allows you to attach a neck lanyard or key ring.  You can also attach TRAK to a backpack, runner's arm band, belt, or anywhere you need it handy. 

 

Carry Options:

Comes with breakaway stainless steel ball chain.




 

 

What's Included with TRAK?

 

 

Kydex Sheath - Thermoplastic Retention Sheath (Case/Cover)

Ball Chain - Stainless Steel Break Away Neck Chain

Paracord Ball Chain Cover - Personalize your neck chain with paracord covers.

Paracord Available Colors:

 

 

You can choose from the following Paracord Ball Chain Covers: 

Tan Camo, Blue, Khaki, Black, or Gray (other colors may become available)

Share for a free titanium key ring:

 


Share our Indiegogo campaign with friends on social media and receive a free titanium key ring with your reward.  Just send us a link or screen shot to: MeetTrak@gmail.com with the subject: "I've Shared TRAK".

 

Reward Choices

Important:

At the end of this campaign, you will receive via email, backer surveys, which will ask you for your color choice, size choice, finish, etc.  You do not need to do this now.  Just select your desired reward tier and we will collect all the other pertinent info from the surveys.

If ordering multiple rewards simply multiply the reward price by the number of items you would like.  Example: 1 TRAK is $29, 2 TRAK's $58, etc, etc.  Want color anodizing?  Simply add that to your reward total as well.

Please Note:

The TRAK knives shown in the video are only prototypes.  We experimented with different sized bevels, anodizing techniques, and finishes.  The final production version will be very close to the first picture at the top of this page.  Some prototypes seen in the video and pictures were used for reference or to demonstrate colors, sheath fit, function, and size comparison only.

Video Soundtrack:

A big thank you to Dyalla for letting us use your music! Check her out on Soundcloud NOW!  You can find her songs featured on Casey Neistat's Vlog.

Music by Dyalla

"Party"

Available: Soundcloud.com

Legal Disclaimer:

It is the responsibility of the buyer/owner to ascertain and obey all applicable local, state, federal and international laws regarding to the purchase, possession, and/or use, of all TRAK products. The owner represents that they, he or she is of legal age and that the products made by TRAK will be used in a lawful manner. TRAK assumes no responsibility for any harm, injury, or unlawful use resulting from the sale, trade, use or handling of any products from TRAK.

 

Risks and challenges

We feel that the risks associated with this project are very minimal and fairly low. We've put together a very experienced team and have already gone through the build process with our current prototypes. 

We have used our suppliers in the past and have established relationships with them. The only foreseen challenge we see is if the project happens to go viral and we receive more orders than anticipated. Just in case, we have allotted extra time in the project timeline to allow for this. We have done our homework and do not anticipate any other risks or challenges.
story_txt:
See more at: www.TRAKknife.com What is TRAK?At less than 1/2 oz, TRAK is the perfect choice for individuals with an active lifestyle that need an ultra lightweight knife. TRAK is the perfect knife for those running alone, biking, hiking, camping or just walking your dog.  Regardless of the environment, TRAK can handle it!  We found that TRAK not only came in handy in a marine environment, but found ourselves wearing it on our daily runs.  With TRAK, you're never alone.    What makes TRAK unique is that you place your index finger in the retention hole and wrap you thumb and middle finger around it. This makes dropping or having TRAK slip out of your hands virtually impossible.  Easy to wear around your neck with our neck sheath set-up, carry it on your keys, or zip tie it to your gear, purse, or backpack.  Simply throw it around your neck for a run or on a key ring for everyday tasks.   
TRAK in Kydex retention sheath  TRAK on titanium key ring 
 

 

Why Titanium?
TRAK is made from military grade titanium (6AL4V), which is the same material used in professional touring bikes, aviation, race cars, and even the SpaceX Falcon 9 rocket.  The benefit of titanium is it's ultra-light weight, twice as strong as its equivalent in steel, rust proof, corrosion proof, and non ferrous (no iron).  Titanium is even used in surgical implants for its harmonizing factor with the human body.
 

Will Not Rust or Corrode- Even in Salt Water!
 
Exposed to the elements (salt water, sweat, high humidity, dirt, etc), TRAK will not rust or corrode. 
 
Handcrafted in the USA
TRAK is 100% hand crafted in the USA.  The titanium is sourced in California and then sent to Texas where the blanks are cut out on a waterjet machine.  The raw TRAK cut-outs are then sent to our shop in Boston, MA where the cutting edge is hand ground.  From there we apply the following finishing treatments: stonewashing, bead blasting, color anodizing, final edge sharpening, tungsten carbide welded to edges, and hand stamped logos. 
We then move on to the Kydex thermoplastic retention sheaths, which are also made one at a time, by hand.
 
 
Handcrafted & Made in USA 
 
 

One Size Doen't Fit All: 
TRAK will be offered in two different sizes.  We understand that one tool cannot fit everyone so we're offering two sizes: Medium and Large.  Please see below for specs.
 


 

Medium vs. Large Size 
TRAK is designed to fit your hand like a glove.  When you insert your index finger into the retention hole, the remaining fingers wrap around TRAK comfortably in their own finger holds.  This gives you a very secure, no slip grip.  As long as you keep your hand closed, TRAK will not fall out!   
 
 
Weight: .5 oz (14 grams) with sheath
 
 Helpful Fit Tip: You can measure the diameter of your index finger with a string just above your knuckle to determine best fit. 
 
 
 
Approx. Same Size As A Military Dog Tag 
 

 
 
Colors:
TRAK will be available in: Gold, Green, Natural, Bronze, Blue, and Purple
 
 
Sheath:
TRAK comes with a thermoplastic Kydex sheath.  This material is heated until soft and pliable and then press formed around TRAK.  Once cooled, Kydex will fit your knife like a custom made glove.  Kydex is waterproof, lightweight, retains its shape better than leather, and can last a lifetime.  The retention sheath has two eyelets at top, which allows you to attach a neck lanyard or key ring.  You can also attach TRAK to a backpack, runner's arm band, belt, or anywhere you need it handy. 
 

Carry Options:

Comes with breakaway stainless steel ball chain.
  
What's Included with TRAK?
  
Kydex Sheath - Thermoplastic Retention Sheath (Case/Cover)
Ball Chain - Stainless Steel Break Away Neck Chain
Paracord Ball Chain Cover - Personalize your neck chain with paracord covers.
Paracord Available Colors:
 
 
You can choose from the following Paracord Ball Chain Covers: 
Tan Camo, Blue, Khaki, Black, or Gray (other colors may become available)

Share our Indiegogo campaign with friends on social media and receive a free titanium key ring with your reward.  Just send us a link or screen shot to: MeetTrak@gmail.com with the subject: "I've Shared TRAK".

If ordering multiple rewards simply multiply the reward price by the number of items you would like.  Example: 1 TRAK is $29, 2 TRAK's $58, etc, etc.  Want color anodizing?  Simply add that to your reward total as well.

story:
DESIGNED FOR

  • Health Conscious Individuals
  • Families with Kids
  • Economically Minded Consumers

 

DYNOMIGHTY DESIGN, Brooklyn NY

The Mighty Stash Pack™ has a compact profile but gives you maximum storage area when storing for your next meal or commuting back from work.

 

The Mighty Stash Pack™ is great for people who want to eat right but don’t want to carry a large lunch bag around. 

The Mighty Stash Pack™  keeps your food warm or cold on your commute and opens to hold more than enough space for a hearty and healthy lunch.

The unique tetrahedron shape expands to hold ample food for any adult lunch yet folds down to a flat slim area when not in use. 

Eating healthy in today's world of processed food, pesticides and food sensitivities has made packing your lunch the best choice for a healthy lifestyle. 

The Mighty Stash Pack™ is an ideal lunch bag solution that won't break the bank when trying to do right for your health and financial well being. 

The Mighty Stash Pack™ looks great anywhere, from the break-room to the boardroom, and can be flipped inside-out for quick and easy cleaning.

HOLDS MORE THAN JUST LUNCH:

Great for;

  • travel
  • the gym
  • dog walks
  • tech gear
  • toys

The Carabiner clips onto a car head rest to hold snacks or toys for traveling with kids. 

Eating right is not just good for your body it's good for your budget!

Packing your lunch is a great way to save money, a report conducted by VISA shows that Americans spend an average of $53 a week or $2,746 per year on lunch.

The inner lining has a storage area for a removable ice pack. The thermal insulated lining keeps your food hot or cold for hours. 

Holds Lots of Food for a Hearty and Healthy Lunch

  • Stores Flat 
  • Large Storage Capacity 
  • Easily to Clean Inside and Out 
  • Insulated Lining Keeps Food Hot or Cold 
  • Durable Polyurethane (PU) Material

story:
Wanderlust:

A strong desire to travel ...


We all dream of traveling. We dream of finding the cool local spots, diving into the culture, and pretending, even if just for a moment, that we belong. It’s a marvelous fantasy. Unfortunately, reality comes crashing back down the moment you decide to take the trip. You spend days researching ideas, review hotels, reserving plane tickets, checking the weather to pack your suitcase, boarding your animals, or any other mundane task it takes to go on your vacation.


But what if it was as easy as choosing a destination or theme, setting your budget, and taking a quiz? In a few days, you receive an email. You open it to find your hotel, plane or car is reserved and paid for. The quiz you took has helped find local places that fit your travelling style. It’s a perfectly planned trip, down to the hidden gems that weren't listed in the tourist guide. It fits your budget, personality, everything is perfect and customized to you.

                                                        Sound Impossible? Think Again...


Wisdom of a Crowd:

The process of taking into account the collective opinion of a group of individuals rather than a single expert to answer a question


By utilizing the wisdom of the crowd, it is possible. A website that researches, plans, reserves, & creates the perfect vacation for you. WanderCrowd.com is that site.


Wandercrowd.com is a revolutionary concept in crowdsourcing. By pooling all the reviews, ratings, and commentary of those around the world your wanderlust can be satiated.


The Road to Vegas is the first toe in the water in the development of WanderCrowd, but we need you. By helping nominate local sights, attractions, and hidden gems along the route, we are one step closer in making it a reality for everyone. A real life test to see what needs to be included in Wandercrowd, how it will impact a vacation, and help us learn first hand how to make it possible.


You will follow Team Deyomood on their 2700 mile adventure to Las Vegas for the 2014 American PoolPlayers Association Scotch Doubles tournament and nominate and vote on aspects of the entire trip. Show off your knowledge of cool local spots in your town or that you've visited. Put a local business on the map for their amazing desserts. Nominate that bed and breakfast with the amazing soft beds. Recommend an amazing sight to stop at along the way 

 Receive status updates, videos, photos and tweets to show you this experiment in action. Watch the concept in action, for the first time. It'll be an interesting trip, you'll be a part of it.


The initial goal set for this event will help cover:

  • GoPro Cameras to document the trip.

  • Development of a viable voting and review system to collect data and votes.

Any additional funds raised will go to R & D of WanderCrowd.com and help develop the initial platform for the site.

Make sure to  like and share on Facebook, Follow and retweet on twitter, tell everyone you know!
