story:
"I believe that this is the only housing which allows you to use the touchscreen to a depth of around 40m. I was impressed by the functionality of the tiny housing and blown away by the video quality. " -- Martin Denison

 
"A DIVEVOLK Diving Assistant with a lens, and your can add one more light if you go deeper, those are all you need. It is the revolution of underwater photography. It is the most compact set I have ever used so far and it has the widest angle with my lens due to short distance between the lens and the iPhone camera. For macro photography, the fillter function and manual  ISO/S settings provided by the customized app is very helpful and you can even touch the phone's screen to focus the  subject and the focus will remains for 5 seconds to allow easy photography. It is amazing!  "- Joe Chang
Macro lens
Macro lens
Macro lens
Wide-angle Lens
Wide-angle Lens
Wide-angle Lens

Panoramic mode

AS SEEN ON

 

Diving Assistant: Use iPhone underwater Just Like on Land

Today, smartphones, with their most powerful hardware and software applications, are bringing communication, convenience, entertainment and much more to meet our needs in daily life on land, in contrast, the use of smartphone underwater are so limited. Meet DIVEVOLK® Diving Assistant! It allows divers to use all phone functions underwater the same way as they do on land, therefore offers water sports enthusiasts great potential for brand new fascinating experience.

 

What is DIVEVOLK® Diving Assistant?

DIVEVOLK® wearable Diving Assistant system is based on the powerful Smartphone hardware platform, combined with self-developed software app, aiming to provide safety, communication and entertainment to divers . The system includes SeaTouchTM touchscreen underwater housing, SeaLightTM underwater strobe, SeaHearTM underwater headphone, DiveHelperTM app and divers' own Smartphone.

 Extremely Compact and Lightweight

Thanks to the innovative mechanical design, SeaTouchTM  housing’s weight is only 110 g(3.8 oz), and the whole set of Diving Assistant is less than 200 g(7 oz)! Say goodbye to heavy photography device, and only dive with fun!

 Full Touchscreen Control

Patented DiveTouchTMtechnology allows full access to all the functions of your Smartphone through touch screen operation. The profiling design enables you to use all the original buttons of your Smartphone.  Battery and overheating are no longer an issue as you can set your iPhone to standby whenever you want.

 Superior Smartphone Safety

Unlike traditional underwater housings which have big openings and long O-rings, Diving Assistant adapting the distinct EasySealTM design, consisting of a small opening, 2-point lock and 3-point fixture, is extremely safe for your smartphone.

 

The ingenious air bag pretest system help you to check the condition of the housing every time before diving, which further guarantee the safety of your Smartphone underwater. 

 Dual Lenses

Rear lens is equipped with anti-reflective coating to ensure the good light transmittance. A series of lens adapters are available for filters and lens option of any other brand.

Built-in selfie lens is available and you can easily access whenever needed. 

 Wireless Charging 

Diving Assistant dose not affect smartphone's wireless charging function. Usually the humidity of dive sites is very high, and if you have an iPhone that supports wireless charging, you can easily charge your phone during diving interval, without taking the iPhone out of the housing the whole day, even if you have several dives, to avoid bring in moisture. 

 Handle and Tray Are Not Mandatory

SeaLightTM is maybe the world’s first underwater strobe and light that is specially designed for Smartphone housings without any handle and tray. Even new divers can handle easily.

 Synchronous Flash

The patented SyncFlashTM technology allows you to use the strobe just like a built-in unit. The unique design with elastic wires can easily release and fix the strobe. It allows a distance of up to 70 cm away from the smartphone. Synchronous flash from any angle you want in order to avoid backscatter specks, spots or blotches in underwater photos due to strobe’s light reflecting off of particles, sand or plankton.

 High Fidelity Underwater Performance

SeaHearTM maybe is the world’s only headphone that can be connected to your smartphone underwater at a depth of up to 50 meters. Proprietary IsoAirTM technology ensures stable and high performance sound effect. Underwater voice alert to prevent improper operation and provide extra security. 

 Versatile Scenarios

IPX8 Waterproof, Shockproof and Dustproof. The compact and handy design facilitates all divers and fits to various outdoor scenarios, even under extreme outdoor environments: waterproof in swimming pool, hot spring, rain and snow, dustproof in desert and thermal insulated in cold area. DIVEVOLK Diving Assistant will be your best companion in outdoor activities. 

 

What Can Diving Assistant Do?

DIVEVOLK All-in-One Diving Assistant aims to bring divers underwater safety, entertainment and communication.

 

Safety

Diving Safety is the most important thing to divers. DIVEVOLK combine iPhone's powerful build-in functions and our special designed application software, to provide divers more protection.

SPG Checking Alarm

SPG checking reminder can be set from a safety perspective. It can remind you to check your SPG every 3/5/10 minutes depends on your setting value.

 

Diving Signal

Diving signals are accessible for the divers whenever needed. New divers can review them anytime even underwater.

 

Water Surface Communication

With the system, you can position, text or even call on sea surface under special situation if there is a 2G/3G/4G signal, while signal is available in many dive sites. Just imaging you come out of water and find the boat is no where, it will be great if he can call the boat and send them the location.

 

Compass

iPhone Built-in compass is easy to access and work well underwater .

 

Diving Computer

With an optional sensor and suitable app, you can use the system as diving computer, record your diving log directly in your iPhone and share immediately.

 

Entertainment

 

Underwater Photography

Smartphone camera performance has been upgraded so fast that it is a good alternative to bulk underwater cameras. Full Access to all modes of the build in camera,  and DIVEVOLK camera with auto photo, manual photo, video, square, SLO-MO, panoramic, time-lapse, built in filter and much more by sliding a finger across the screen. 3rd party apps for color correction and more are convenient and powerful.

 

Underwater Music

We are not encourage people to listen to music while diving, the main purpose of our headphone is to hear safety reminder but do not disturb others. But if you are technical divers who need to stop for a long period, or you want to practice swimming, free diving and mermaid diving in swimming pool, underwater music will bring you a lot of fun! Music cure underwater for those people who have special needs are also helpful. 

 

 

Instant Upload & Share

You do not need to take out of the phone from housing the whole day and use it whenever you want. So convenient!

 

Diving Apps

We think the most meaningful part of Diving Assistant is it establishes an open platform for the upcoming diving apps, which were scarce before due to the lack of hardware support, to bring divers safety, entertainment, convenience and much more. For example Fish Identification app, color restore app, diving training app, etc.

 

Communication

 

Human Communication

Type a message to your buddy underwater.

Instructors can communicate with students by broadcast some audio message you set before diving, or you can record and show them where they can improve. 

Human-Machine Interaction

Just like on land, make use of your smartphone functions by sliding your fingers. As technical divers, sometimes you may want to save some check list in your smartphone and work according to these steps underwater? 

Machine- Machine Interaction

With Bluetooth and WiFi available, It enables smartphone to be used as control terminal for other diving equipment. Let your drone go deeper with Diving Assistant!

 

How the DIVEVOLK®'s Feature Compare to Other Underwater Smartphone Housing?

 

SPECIFICATIONS

SeaTouch Underwater Smartphone Housing

SeaLight Underwater Strobe

SeaHear Underwater Headphone

 

SHARE WITH FRIENDS AND FAMILY! 

 

 

 

 

Why INDIEGOGO?

Pre-Order. The main purpose of this campaign is for promotional and pre-order activities. Instead of raising money, we are offering the project backers an unique opportunity to get our band new amazing product at an incredibly attractive price immediately after the end of the product campaign and before the sale of the product in the open market. All pre-ordered products will also come with a 1-year warranty.

Face to face. Indiegogo is a great way of facing our fans. We have done hundreds of experiments on our products in many countries in order to eliminate deficiencies and create the highest performing product we can, but we can always improve. We need more feedback from divers from all over the world to help us improve and make the greatest diving assistant in the world. And you can help us accomplish this either by becoming a backer or giving feedback on our Facebook page.

About US

We are a group of engineers and divers. Our team members have over 20 years experiences on manufacturing, and strong background in the field of R&D, design optimization and mold improvement. Some of us are new divers, we do not stick to traditional design of diving gear, but put imaginative innovation in our product to make sure every new diver can handle easily. Our passion on diving and innovation made us come together, and inspired us to produce the most portable and powerful diving assistant. We are excited to share them with the rest of the world. 

Our dream is to bring safety and more fun to all divers and water sports enthusiasts and give them the opportunity to enjoy a brand new underwater experience and record their best moments.

PRODUCTION STAGE

We understand that smartphones are extremely important to us as they carries important files and data which we cares a lot, so besides our unique mechanical design, we did all kinds of testing and improvement to ensure the highest reliability and quality. We believe DIVEVOLK Diving Assistant is the only smartphone underwater housing which passed drop test and impact test.

Check our testing video here!


Diving Assistant is something brand new in the market, and it took us almost 3 years to develop, test and improve Diving Assistant with so many fantastic functions as you can see. With more than 30 patents we obtained, now we have successfully pushed it into production stage, and we are busy working on preparing enough stock in order to ship the orders as soon as we can. 

TIMELINE

Instead of raising money, we are offering the project backers an unique opportunity to get our band new amazing product at an incredibly attractive price immediately after the end of the product campaign and before the sale of the product in the open market. All pre-ordered products will also come with a 1-year warranty.Face to face. Indiegogo is a great way of facing our fans. We have done hundreds of experiments on our products in many countries in order to eliminate deficiencies and create the highest performing product we can, but we can always improve. We need more feedback from divers from all over the world to help us improve and make the greatest diving assistant in the world. And you can help us accomplish this either by becoming a backer or giving feedback on our Facebook page.About USWe are a group of engineers and divers. Our team members have over 20 years experiences on manufacturing, and strong background in the field of R&D, design optimization and mold improvement. Some of us are new divers, we do not stick to traditional design of diving gear, but put imaginative innovation in our product to make sure every new diver can handle easily. Our passion on diving and innovation made us come together, and inspired us to produce the most portable and powerful diving assistant. We are excited to share them with the rest of the world. Our dream is to bring safety and more fun to all divers and water sports enthusiasts and give them the opportunity to enjoy a brand new underwater experience and record their best moments.PRODUCTION STAGEWe understand that smartphones are extremely important to us as they carries important files and data which we cares a lot, so besides our unique mechanical design, we did all kinds of testing and improvement to ensure the highest reliability and quality. We believe DIVEVOLK Diving Assistant is the only smartphone underwater housing which passed drop test and impact test.Check our testing video here!



Diving Assistant is something brand new in the market, and it took us almost 3 years to develop, test and improve Diving Assistant with so many fantastic functions as you can see. With more than 30 patents we obtained, now we have successfully pushed it into production stage, and we are busy working on preparing enough stock in order to ship the orders as soon as we can. 
TIMELINE

story:
• The special inbuilt pocket keeps all your valuables dry with the first Self sealing waterproof pocket in the world!
  • Certified to 30 meters/ 100ft underwater
  • The waterproof pocket has a five year warranty.

Magnets are safe to use with credit cards and phones. 

 The-technology was originally used in dry-bags. Gooper https://gooperhermetic.com/ has more information about the Magnetic Technology and how it works. We partnered with Gooper to use this magnetic technology to develop the perfect waterproof pocket for clothing.

This is ergonomic, comfortable and designed for intuitive use on the go. The magnetic technology outperforms traditional waterproof zips as unlike them it closes automatically, leaving no room for error, it does not require lubrication and it gets reinforced by water pressure the deeper you go.

Water and Stain Repelling Fabric

  • Designed for travel. no spills or stains can get in your way 
  • The shorts also dry much faster than normal fabrics. 
  • That means less Laundry more adventures.

The best clothing is versatile

In every sense of the word versatility is at the centre of every design decision, every fabric choice and every last stitch.

Transform from a smart tailored look while exploring the city to a being ready for spontaneous beach adventures. Without ever taking off your shorts.

Sizing MENS: in inches

 S 28-30

M 30-32

L 32-34

XL 35-37

XXL 37-39

XXXL 40-42

Sizing WOMENS: in inches 

No XS size but the side fasters can reduce waist by 1 inch further.

S 28-30

M 30-31.5

L 32-33.5

XL 34-36

XXL 36-38 

XXXL 39-41

If you follow the sizing chart carefully, then the shorts will fit you just fine. Still, if you wish to exchange your shorts for any reason, we will allow you to do that as long as they have not been used.  You will just need to cover the two way shipping. As we are offering our shorts at highly discounted prices on Kickstarter, we won’t be accepting returns.

WARRANTY: the 5-year warranty is specifically for the Gooper Waterproof Pocket Itself, and the manufacturer warranty is as follows:

Manufacturer (Gooper Hermetic Ltd) warranty the Gooper Waterproof Pocket, against defects.

For the period of 5 years from the original date of purchase and subject to the limitations of the warranty, manufacturer will supply at no charge, new or rebuilt replacement parts in exchange so long as (1) provides proof of purchase, and (2) manufacturer must determine the equipment is defective.The manufacturer(s) take no responsibility for the content of the waterproof pocket, and it is up to the customer to test the waterproof pocket before using it. The waterproof pocket has been extensively tested and certified waterproof 30 meters underwater, we stand by the quality and use the highest quality materials, and manufacturing process. Please Email/ message us about any queries you have.

The hub, where the secrets are first revealed and adventures are planned happens live on our Social Channels. 

 Be inspired

While on my first backpacking adventure in South East Asia I realised how necessary it was to be prepared for the unexpected and found it useful to carry my passport and cash on my while exploring. The problem was that was almost impossible to do near the water, which I happened to be a lot !

After seeing the only solutions either weighed me down or didn't feel safe, I  decided to do something about it...

 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

For Wholesale enquires please email : hello@aquanautia.com  

For Press Kit please contact : hello@aquanautia.com

story:
Greetings and nice to have your attention.

My name is Kendall Henderson and I am a graphic designer based in Brooklyn New York. Me and a few curious travelers spent a little over a week being blown away by everything Tokyo has to offer. We snapped way too many photos and took in as much of the vibrant culture as we could. (Which you can check out here.)

We spent at least one night in 5 different districts and embraced the friendly personalities of the city. For the past few years I have been undergoing a personal design project focused around the travel and exploration. I am currently working on items representing the trip to Tokyo. 

Along side the many photos I have taken I would like to create a tangible piece to reference some of the common graphic and typographic visuals seen in the captivating city of Tokyo, Japan. 

This is where we need your help.



The visual stimuli that is received by being in the busy stations of Shinjuku or the signs and displays that cover Shibuya, down to the hundreds of snacks you may find inside a Family Mart. As an English speaking and reading individual. So I created this poster as a recap of most of the things I came across. Reducing objects and visuals to their purest shapes, colors and typography.

Printing specs.

Limited edition of 100. Hand numbered posters

Printing location: Circle Press. New York

4 color process 

On Silk coated 100# Cover stock


The Idea

The idea for creating the poster came from the the iconic items of the the city and the massive amounts of communication seen when in the various districts. With an interesting twist coming from an non Japanese speaking perspective.


The palette is derived from a book I stumbled upon at the MoMa PS1 book fair by japanese art teacher Sanzo Wada who created a dictionary of color combinations in the 1930's that has been re-published by Seigensha. Which lends its self perfectly to this concept.


Challenges

In an effort to make sure this project remains authentic I have been gathering many reference points from Japanese books, friends and photographs taken while in the city. 

I will be working with a local New York printer to offset print 100 A1 posters and extra goodies. I have not calculated shipping costs to everywhere in the world, however I would like keep the shipping and distribution costs out of you the backers hands.

Further shipping information will be provided soon*


Support

If you are into the project and work with or know of an interested blog or community, please share or contact me for more images and details. 

Thanks.

story:
PITTA is a modular transformative drone that enables true versatility in a way that you capture your experience.


It’s not just aerial, not just handheld, not just wearable or mountable, it’s all of these. It’s a complete system packed into a single device.


PITTA is small (170 mm / 6.7 inches) and light (200g / 7oz) to take with you everywhere without added bulk. 

 


Out of the box, you get a camera, drone module and an action cam module to be able to get the collection of compelling clips in different points of views.


Furthermore, you can dock the PITTA onto the charging cradle to use it as a live streaming home security camera on the daily basis when you are between adventures. 

 


Media Inquiries - Contact@pitta.co

 

With our modular Snap and Twist-to-Lock design, mode changes between Aerial and ground are seamless and easy.  


Simply snap on the drone module magnetically and get PITTA off the ground to hover in the air. With the auto-follow mode on, you can start recording in the matter of seconds with you focusing on the experience. 

 

DEMO - SETTING UP AUTO FOLLOW

Setting up the Auto-Follow is effortless.

  • 1. Tap the AUTO FOLLOW icon 
  • 2. Drag & Draw a rectangle to let PITTA know what to target
  • 3. Let the Autonomous shooting begin

 

When you are ready to get down to the ground level shots, snap on the action cam module on any standard action cam mount to start recording your adventure.

 

DEMO - ACTION CAM MODE

 

When you are between adventures, PITTA can be turned into a Home Security (IP Wi-Fi) Camera that streams to your mobile device whenever and wherever you are. 

Simply dock it on to the charging cradle and power the PITTA on. 
 


With 1-click-flying modes and Auto-follow, even the first time pilots can fly and start recording their experience without any hassle. 

We also provide a manual flight interface to provide flexibilities in types of shots you want to capture. 

PITTA offers a design that is easy and intuitive for everyone - even for hobbyists and first time users. It's light, portable designs make it easy for PITTA to fit right into your lifestyle.

 

 

 

 


Weight and the size was the first thing we considered. Weighing under 200g (7oz) with 170mm (6.7in) of diagonal distance, PITTA is as light and portable as a smart phone that is easy to hold in one hand - which makes takeoff & landing easy even with just one hand.


With the 3-pole-hole that is compatible with standard action cam mount, you can capture your adventures in handheld or mounted in action Cam mode.


Portability is further enhanced with the foldable wings. Aside from saving you spaces, folding out wings when attached to the camera body will lock drone modules tightly to the camera module to prevent it from falling off. 


Caps covering each motor protects PITTA from environmental hazards such as light rains and dust. 


An ultrasonic sensor for ground detection and rubber padding on the housing prevent further water influx through the bottom of PITTA.

To help users with positioning and aligning the modules, magnets are embedded in each module. The camera is capable of tilting up and down, does no protrude and is entirely covered by the protector to prevent damage.

 


Power Monitor

The PITTA App monitors how much battery your phone has left - so that it doesn't operate when the battery level on your phone is below the minimum required to securely fly PITTA.

Fully charged, the PITTA Selfie Drone operates for 15 minutes. When it is running out of battery, it will send an alarm or notification to your mobile phone to keep you updatedon the current status.

No Registration Required (United States)

PITTA is light and small enough to be piloted without FAA registration (No altitude restriction either). This applies to the US-market.

 

 

 


Vision recognition technology 

Before PITTA, we have developed and delivered multiple computer vision solutions to the Smart Factory and Surveillance market.

Our proprietary SVM (Smart Vision Module) is based on image tracking and deep learning to self-improve its tracking accuracy over time.

The same technology has been implemented to PITTA in order to bring technical advantages such as the following:

Upgradable Firmware

With our proprietary vision recognition technology, we will be adding deep-learning based object recognition and tracking to PITTA, which will improve the autonomous flying accuracy over time. This will happen through firmware updates throughout 2018 - we will keep working on enhancing your experience with PITTA. Stay tuned for updates on the progress.

Flight Control System 

One of the most important aspects of building a drone is the flight control system it operates on. While many drone makers are outsourcing this part, we have developed our own proprietary solution in conjunction with the Vision Recognition module - meaning that we can continue on improving and developing the core functions of PITTA.

One of our biggest challenges was to connect the Flight Control Computer (FCC) and main CPU, which is in charge of vision recognition and cameras and connect it into a complete system. We are using the best middle-class CPU available which enable PITTA to capture high quality images despite its compact size, including digital image stabilization.
 
Due to the compact size, Time-lapse and Slo-mo functions are available only on the action camera mode. The diverse features will be triggered according to each mode through the mobile application.

 

 

 

 


EYEDEA is a serious start-up with a growing full-time members, funding, a production ready working prototype and lots of exciting momentums. Before PITTA, we have delivered multiple computer vision solutions to Smart Factory and Surveillance market.

Due to the compact size, Time-lapse and Slo-mo functions are available only on the action camera mode. The diverse features will be triggered according to each mode through the mobile application.


 

 

 

 

EYEDEA is a serious start-up with a growing full-time members, funding, a production ready working prototype and lots of exciting momentums. Before PITTA, we have delivered multiple computer vision solutions to Smart Factory and Surveillance market.

story:
Overview 

     I am an aspiring Environmental Chemist with a love for vegan food and trees.  My love for the environment started when I was young and a self proclaimed "tree hugger" and vegetarian.  This has only increased as I've gotten older and melded for my love of chemistry, to give me my current life direction.  My gap year will allow me to explore environmentally friendly ways of living, farming, and building, while also giving me a chance to live in a beautiful place.  

     While I am in Paonia I hope to:

  • Learn Sustainable Farming techniques
  • Live with a group of new people and develop relationships
  • Meditate and practice yoga consistently
  • Explore the outdoors, going on hikes and camping trips
  • Develop leadership skills that will help me with my future endeavors 

While I'm in Guatemala I hope to:

  • Develop perspective as to how the rest of the world lives outside of the United States
  • Learn Spanish and history of Guatemala
  • Live with a local family to truly understand what life is like in the country 

By contributing to my campaign you would be helping me to learn more about myself, my intended field of study, and gain worldly perspective.  As a young adult, just starting out, I am grateful to everyone who supports me and helps me as I begin my journey.

What I Need & What You Get

There are three main expenses for my upcoming trip:

  1. The program itself (High Desert Center for Sustainable Studies Gap Year) , which costs $7,500
  2. Airfare, I will be flying from home to Denver and back twice and from Denver to Guatemala City and back.  While flights from home to Denver are around $300, it costs about $1,000 for a flight to Guatemala.
  3. Gear:  Since I will be doing many hikes and camping trips I need gear such as a hiking backpack, sleeping bag, boots, warm clothes, and more.  My approximate budget for all of these items is $800.

Luckily, I have savings that I have been contributing to over the past two years that will cover most of the cost of the program, but I still need to buy gear and plane tickets.  In exchange for your donation, I have several perks that are related to my trip and my interests.

Other Ways You Can Help

I Understand that not everyone can support me financially, but I value support in any way you can give it.  If you find that you cannot donate to my cause, here are two things that you can do to help me get to my goal:

  1. Share my fundraising campaign on Facebook, Email, Instagram, Twitter, or whatever social media platform you use.  Spreading the word will help me reach even more people.
  2. Follow me on social media to keep up with my travels and see pictures!

story:
Do you like warm weather, vacations, and helping others?  (The Details)

If you’ve ever been to Savannah, you know what an amazing town it is – history, architecture, amazing restaurants, warm weather, and a plethora of other fabulous and fun things to see and do. If you haven’t – well, we can’t wait for you to come and visit! 

Why on earth am I talking about how wonderful Savannah is? Simple.  As a special education teacher and resident of Savannah’s beautiful Historic District, I know two things:  People love (and want to visit) our town, and I am also in the unenviable position of working with families firsthand who are stretched beyond capacity. I have seen the stress that having a child with special needs can place on a marriage, other siblings and the family unit.

It is the combination of these two experiences that have led me to develop the concept behind this campaign.  Take a Break, Inc. is a vacation rental company with a difference – we utilize funds raised from patrons to provide families of children with special needs an opportunity to enjoy complimentary respite in Historic Savannah in a residence that caters to the specific and specialized needs of their family, as well as providing trained and experienced special education teachers and support staff to provide a much needed break to these families.

When you contribute to this campaign, you are helping with so much more than material purchases. YOU are helping Take a Break, Inc. to lay the foundations for something that will help spread the good our world so desperately needs.  

Without your donation, our concept is just an idea (a REALLY good one, but we’re biased :)), and fulfillment will take us so much longer to achieve.  The faster we get this funded, the quicker we can begin providing amazing experiences for our patrons, while helping give families with special needs children the time together they so desperately deserve.

Here’s What We Need, and Where It’s Going:

Our idea is unique – there literally isn’t another program like it in Savannah (or anywhere in the Coastal Empire!) Our “Take-a-Break, Give a Break” program gives patrons with an excellent experience and the opportunity to 'give back' simply by staying in our property.  All profits go towards funding a vacation for a family in need of quality time together. Take a Break, Inc. will offer outstanding, personalized service to both revenue and not-for-profit customers, and will allow us to offer competitive pricing and an amazing vacation experience for all. This is just the first of many amazing locations and experiences for our patrons!

So, where’s the money going?  Clearly the biggest expense is going to be the purchase of the property.  And while this will be our biggest cost, it will also be our biggest asset and allow us to eventually add additional properties and locations to the Take a Break, Inc. experience!

Our goal is $686,200. It’s lofty. But as I always tell my students (and their families) if we don’t aim high, we don’t know what we’re capable of.

So, where does that crazy amount go?  Here’s the breakdown:

Amount/What We’re doing with it:

Details:

$568,000 Property Location

We have met with our realtor, Chelsea Phillips (look her up, she’s AMAZING!  Chelsea was our personal realtor when we moved to Savannah, and has been voted the best in Savannah for several years in a row. While property values are hard to predict, and we may find one for less than this, we feel this is a good place to start. We are looking for a 2-3 bedroom property (with space for a separate sensory room or area) in the Historic District, with a garden level entry for families that have children with mobility issues. Please see this link for a property similar to the one we are looking at:

 

https://www.trulia.com/property/3231865322-102-W-Jones-St-Savannah-GA-31401

 

This amount includes all taxes, commissions, and closing costs.

 

$15,000 Property Furnishings

Property furnishings (furniture, linens, electronics, appliances, kitchen supplies and bathroom essentials). This is a generous estimate, and excess will be placed into the building maintenance fund for use and replacement as needed.

$25,000 Sensory Equipment, specialist and Mobility Support for Special Education Families

This amount includes the purchase and installation of changing tables, sensory support equipment (e.g. swings, rocking balls, soft play equipment, weighted blankets, and seating supports etc…

$0 Salaries.

Take a Break, Inc. is all volunteer, so no salaries will be paid. We get paid by helping others. That’s it.  

$4,000 Insurance Costs

Liability, flood, home, and disaster insurance for the first year (we will be using our personal insurance agent, Sam Sharpe of State Farm). This is an estimated cost. 

$1200 Website Setup

Professional website building and hosting for the first two years.

$3000 Marketing

This will be applied towards marketing on social media platforms.

$5000 Building Maintenance Fund

This fund will cover any structural concerns that arise, termite bonds and other such concerns.

$5000 Legal Costs

This amount will be used to prepare any legal documents, such as contracts for revenue-raising customers and agreements for “Give a Break” program recipients. We will be using Brannen, Searcy, and Smith LLP for this process. We have had excellent experiences with this firm in the past. 

$62,000 Indiegogo Platform Fee

This fee may be waived if we can get our 501 (3) (c) status approved prior to funding completed. It has been filed, we are waiting on completion.

 

These amounts are estimates only, but are based on extensive research and discussions with appropriate experts and businesses.

So, What are we going to do with the funds from this campaign if we don’t reach our goal? That’s easy. We’re going to apply for grants and reach out to local businesses for donation of time and services until we get there, but that will take time and that will mean that there will be families who don’t get the opportunity

This IS going to happen, but how quickly we are able to begin helping others depends on how soon we can get this campaign/project funded.

That said, if we don’t get the funds we’re looking for, we aren’t going to let that stop us. Here’s our list of priorities as far as funding goes:

  • Deposit on property (20%)   
  • Costs associated with property preparation for rental
  • Purchase of equipment needed for special education students

 

Your Change Will Change Lives:

Take a Break, Inc. expects to enjoy a year-round demand for its property, both in terms of revenue raising customers and families benefiting from the "Give-a-Break" program.

Savannah is a town that people love to visit - warm weather, rich history, fantastic food, proximity to the beach (Tybee Island), festivals, markets, and many other amazing things to see and do. There is a strong demand for vacation rentals as an economical alternative to traditional hotels and the opportunity to explore all that Savannah has to offer while enjoying the comforts of a home-like environment.

A vacation rental experience that provides revenue-based customers with an excellent experience and the opportunity to 'give back' simply by staying in the property is unique to Take a Break, Inc. All profits go towards funding a vacation for a family in need of respite. This approach is highly unique, with no competition in the immediate or surrounding areas. Take a Break, Inc. will offer outstanding, personalized service to both revenue and not-for-profit customers, and will allow us to offer competitive pricing and an amazing vacation experience for all.

The idea of our organization is to help provide families with children that have specialized needs enjoy a family vacation while providing a warm, safe environment, sensory/disability support equipment, and trained and certified professionals/special education teachers to give parents a night out together. All profits will be reinvested into adding further services and perhaps even properties to our program so we may help more families in more locations.

Once you’re up and running, how will this work? Will you need more donations and campaigns to keep going? 

If you’re like me, you’ve donated to campaigns and causes before only to find out that all of the proceeds go to operating costs and very little to the people who the organization is actually trying to help. Once our campaign amount is fulfilled, we will be a self-sustaining organization. Meaning we will operate solely on the money from folks using paying to use our vacation rental. As an all volunteer organization there are no staffing costs,  and the only overhead are the day-to-day costs of running a house. As such, we are able to use the majority of our money directly to provide activities, and accommodation to our special needs families as well as competitive pricing to those that choose to help those families by staying in our property and participating in our take a break, give a break program. The great news is, even with a generous stipend for each family, and as you will see from the table below, with your assistance we can actually utilize any profits to expand out program and help more families. This is just the beginning!

Sounds Good, But What Are The Risks?  Do you have a business plan?

I know this all sounds great, but what are the risks? Challenges?  In developing the Take a Break, Inc.  concept and discussing it with hundreds of special education parents across the country (and even the world!) my number one concern/question was with regard to whether or not people would actually take advantage of  the opportunity. The response was overwhelmingly positive, and I did not have one person tell me they would not take advantage or that it was not an idea that they would support. What I DID hear from parents I spoke to was how tired they were, how hard it was to go on vacation with their special needs children because they didn’t have the room for all the things they had to take with them, they didn’t have the funds, they didn’t think they’d be welcomed…. The list, quite literally, was endless (and made me all the more determined to make this a success).

With the vacation rental market in Savannah growing as consistently as the tourism industry, and the opportunity for Take a Break, Inc. to be the only option of it’s kind in a town that receives millions of visitors each year, I know that this concept will be successful.

That said, I believe in being well prepared. I have spoken with my realtor (Chelsea Phillips) and worked with other vacation rental owners in the area. I have reviewed occupancy statistics for the past 5 years (a consistent average of 37 weeks per year) and compared costs of similar rentals to ensure that this venture will be well received in terms of revenue-raising patrons and, by extension our "Give-a-Break" program participants.

Take a Break DOES have a business plan with more detailed figures, breakdowns and studies. I am more than happy to share it. Please contact me.

I Can’t Donate, But Can I Help In Other Ways?

You can help with grant writing, volunteering, but most importantly you can share our campaign with your networks. If you’re a marketing genius, website creation savant, contract writing wonder or have connections with companies that can help supply or support us with equipment for children with special needs, PLEASE reach out! It takes a village.
story_txt:
Do you like warm weather, vacations, and helping others?  (The Details)If you’ve ever been to Savannah, you know what an amazing town it is – history, architecture, amazing restaurants, warm weather, and a plethora of other fabulous and fun things to see and do. If you haven’t – well, we can’t wait for you to come and visit! Why on earth am I talking about how wonderful Savannah is? Simple.  As a special education teacher and resident of Savannah’s beautiful Historic District, I know two things:  People love (and want to visit) our town, and I am also in the unenviable position of working with families firsthand who are stretched beyond capacity. I have seen the stress that having a child with special needs can place on a marriage, other siblings and the family unit.It is the combination of these two experiences that have led me to develop the concept behind this campaign.  Take a Break, Inc. is a vacation rental company with a difference – we utilize funds raised from patrons to provide families of children with special needs an opportunity to enjoy complimentary respite in Historic Savannah in a residence that caters to the specific and specialized needs of their family, as well as providing trained and experienced special education teachers and support staff to provide a much needed break to these families.When you contribute to this campaign, you are helping with so much more than material purchases. YOU are helping Take a Break, Inc. to lay the foundations for something that will help spread the good our world so desperately needs.  Without your donation, our concept is just an idea (a REALLY good one, but we’re biased :)), and fulfillment will take us so much longer to achieve.  The faster we get this funded, the quicker we can begin providing amazing experiences for our patrons, while helping give families with special needs children the time together they so desperately deserve.Here’s What We Need, and Where It’s Going: Our idea is unique – there literally isn’t another program like it in Savannah (or anywhere in the Coastal Empire!) Our “Take-a-Break, Give a Break” program gives patrons with an excellent experience and the opportunity to 'give back' simply by staying in our property.  All profits go towards funding a vacation for a family in need of quality time together. Take a Break, Inc. will offer outstanding, personalized service to both revenue and not-for-profit customers, and will allow us to offer competitive pricing and an amazing vacation experience for all. This is just the first of many amazing locations and experiences for our patrons!So, where’s the money going?  Clearly the biggest expense is going to be the purchase of the property.  And while this will be our biggest cost, it will also be our biggest asset and allow us to eventually add additional properties and locations to the Take a Break, Inc. experience!Our goal is $686,200. story:
The Carpe Diem Eco Project is a humanitarian eco-tourism project. The goal is to empower the local people of Nicaragua by utilizing its tremendous tourism potential, while minimizing environmental impact.

In order to accomplish this, I wish to build a sustainable ecolodge, with the help of others, interested in supporting this cause. The ecolodge will immediately reinvest the profits that it generates to create or fund local and vetted humanitarian and conservation initiatives. It will serve as an educational centre, create employment opportunities and economic benefits for local people. It will also provide free accommodations for legitimate humanitarian organizations and at the same time, it will provide nice and affordable lodging for travellers.


For the construction of the lodge, I will be using the Cob building technique. After extensive research, I fell in love with Cob building because of its sturdiness, minimal environmental impact, and low cost. Cob is a mixture made from clay, sand, straw and water. It is the key material for the construction of the ecolodge. Cob is natural, fireproof, termite-proof, resistant to seismic activities, inexpensive, easy to build and so much more! 

                                      


The location of the lodge is on a peninsula called Isla Los Brasiles, 30 minutes away from the beautiful colonial city of Leon on the Pacific coast of Nicaragua. For the past three years, I have been researching, working, and saving for this project. In order to avoid loans and investors (that could potentially compromise the integrity of the mission for financial gain), I worked for years, while keeping my living costs very lean, so that I could save enough money to purchase the land myself. I have full confidence in the ecolodge, and in May 2014, I completed the purchase of 10,500 square meters of beachfront property. This is now the site of the ecolodge, and already has 50 trees planted by myself and an employee hired to maintain the land. With wild nature, untouched beaches, no cars, amazing sunsets, and millions of stars, it is paradise!!! After the lodge is built, I will manage the lodge using my thorough knowledge of the area, and my extensive experience in hospitality.

                                         


Any kind of help is more than welcome, but there are 4 ways that you can make a big difference.

1. Help finance the building of the Carpe Diem Ecolodge.

Help jumpstart the project by making a donation to the construction of the ecolodge. For your donation, you will receive a gift certificate valued at your donation dollar amount to spend at the lodge.

2. Help with the construction efforts of the Carpe Diem Ecolodge.

You don't need special skills to build with cob – nearly everyone can do it, and there will be experienced builders around you. It is not difficult, but it is time-consuming. Come and join us this winter. We will be there from January until June 2015. Escape the cold and join us where it is warm year-round! The campground will be provided for free, just bring your tent. Help with construction a few hours a day and spend the rest of your day enjoying the sun, the beach, the beautiful Nicaragua. We are going to have a great time!

3. Choose the Carpe Diem Ecolodge for your next holiday. 

The profits will be reinvested in the local communities, so just by having a great time staying at the Carpe Diem Ecolodge, you are making a difference!

4. Share the promotion video and spread the word with your friends.

The more people know about the project, the greater impact we can make!

Please visit the Carpediemecoproject.com web page for more information and to watch the complete video.

Thank You!

story:
Dear outgoing friend,

I want to share this product with all you travelers, picnickers, beach lovers, and people that want to be in comfort wherever they go.

The product that I am offering is the, all in one, Dynamo Backpack Travel Luggage and Chair, aka. Dynamo Chair, aka Best Backpack Chair.

I'm seeking to share my product with you and hope to reach an order quantity of over 1000 units with your help and for your satisfaction.

All investors would receive their very own Dynamo Backpack Travel Luggage Chair as shown in the videos, or an even newer and more recent design, at a retail price of $59 for each Dynamo Backpack Travel Luggage Chair you purchase. If you wish to purchase two Dynamo Chairs then you will receive both Chairs, for the incredible price of $110. This is an incredible offer. This product is the most incredible portable chair that has ever been made, and is the ideal product for those that require good back support which no other folding chairs can offer. All shipping charges due separately prior to shipping to your destination.

The Dynamo Backpack Travel Luggage Chaise Lounger which come with a leg rest built in, will be offered to you at an incredible price of $79 each.  If you wish to purchase two Dynamo Chairs with the leg rest, you will receive two of these Chaise Lounger Dynamo Chairs with the Leg Rest, for the incredible price of $149 for both. All shipping charges due separately prior to shipping to your destintion.

The money received will be used to manufacture this product for you, our valued supporters and customers here at Indiegogo.

So come and join with us in experiencing this amazing product and be part of this incredible life experience.

My name is AJ and I have over 20 years of engineering experience and that is why I have such an amazing product to share with you. I have back trouble myself, and for those of you that know how important good lumbar support is, you will truly benefit from the comfort of this amazing chair.

Sincerely,

Ambert Jue
www.dynamodesigns.us

All shipping charges due separately prior to shipping to your destintion.

The
money received will be used to manufacture this
product for you, our valued supporters and customers here at Indiegogo. So come and join with us in experiencing this amazing product and be part of this incredible life experience.My name is AJ and I have over 20 years of engineering experience and that is why I have such an amazing product to share with you. I have back trouble myself, and for those of you that know how important good lumbar support is, you will truly benefit from the comfort of this amazing chair.Sincerely,Ambert Juewww.dynamodesigns.us

story:
How tough is titanium?

This is a question I asked myself recently. A metal named for its extreme properties after the Titans of Greek mythology. Stronger and lighter than steel, and corrosion resistant on top of that. Asking myself this question made me realize how easy it is for a designer to lose feeling with the materials of the objects we design. I mostly design on the computer these days; a virtual space in which I can cut bars of steel in half with a few mouse clicks. The realization that the only way to truly answer the question is by experiencing it, led to this project. I decided to create a small titanium object, without the use of computers. Just me, my hands and my tools.


Kiridashi

For inspiration I studied the ancient Japanese culture of knife and sword making. The Tidashi design is based on the Kiridashi-Kogatana: a traditional Japanese utility knife. It is an elegant and deceptively simple design, with its relatively long handle and short cutting edge. In Japan this tool is still relied upon for making accurate cuts or markings on wood. The Tidashi is a small tool, but its design allows you to exert excellent control over its cutting tip, accurately executing everyday cutting tasks. I find it especially suited for opening boxes, because the short blade design prevents you from penetrating the box too deeply and damaging its content.


Tungsten Carbide

Another Japanese knife making technique applied in the Tidashi knife is the fusion of different metals in a single knife, bringing out the best properties of each. Titanium is an extremely tough material and in my exploration of its toughness I have ruined many a saw. However, tough is not the same as hard. A cutting edge needs to be hard, and among the hardest metals known to man is tungsten. I therefore fused a thin layer of this extremely hard metal to the cutting edge of the Tidashi. The result is a knife with the toughness and lightness of Titanium, but with the hardness of tungsten carbide precisely where needed. The tungsten carbide is only embedded on one side of the blade. The reason for this is a principle often applied in self sharpening knives: as the relatively softer titanium wears away through normal use, the thin and sharp edge of the tungsten carbide is exposed more, creating a fresh cutting edge.

Heat Anodizing

Another unusual and rather magical property of titanium is that it naturally develops a hard wearing layer of titanium oxide. By skillfully applying heat, this natural process can be exaggerated and the layer of oxide can be grown to greater thicknesses. The thickness of the layer affects the way light is reflected of the knife, resulting in an amazing array of colors. A consistent thickness is hard to achieve, and so far I have managed to master creating an even gold colored layer. I personally like the rainbow variation of this anodized coating for its unpredictability (it fits the dogma of the project of relinquishing absolute control over the design).

Variations

The Tidashi comes in a few variations. The brushed version shows the titanium in its raw and grey appearance, as some people know it. This version has a tough and utilitarian look to it. The polished version is perhaps the most neutral looking. The high polish gives a clean and crisp look to the knife. The polished gold colored version is very classy looking, and in my opinion this variation of the knife could almost pass as a piece of jewelry. The polished rainbow colored version is the most playful of them all. The coloring is slightly unpredictable and differs from knife to knife. The result is a one of a kind finish on each knife, reflecting the spirit of the project and the fact that each knife is hand made by me.

Variations: Rainbow Polished, Gold Colored Polished, Natural Polished, Natural Brushed

Around your neck or on your keychain

One of the strengths of a good tool has very little to do with the tool itself. A good tool is only useful when you have it with you when you need it. I specifically created the Tidashi to be of a diminutive size, so that you can carry it with you at all times. I also designed a system which allows you to either carry it as a highly functional necklace, or less noticeably as a keychain. The sheath of the knife itself is made of a heat stable silicone material, which means that the knife should not accidently slide out when, for example, left in the sun. It comes in either white or black, to best match your choice of finish on the knife. The cord to which the sheath is attached (and which can be easily replaced by the supplied key ring) is made of a resilient Paracord, able to resist a pulling force of 95 lbs. It comes in various colors to compliment the different finishes of the knives, and the colors of the sheaths.



Handcrafted in America

I expected this project to help me understand what the properties of such a tough material as titanium really feel like when handled. I hoped it would make me more aware of material properties in general and thus make me a more aware and better designer. I can now say that it certainly has fulfilled those expectations, but something else has come from it. Something I had not given much thought before. This project taught me what it means to put love and pride into crafting something by hand. In making these knives I experienced the sensation of transferring more that the knife itself to its future owner. I truly believe that knowing how, where and by whom your Tidashi is made will give you at least some of the pride and satisfaction I felt when creating it.


Desk Version Add-On

Following a bout of collective inspiration, I am pleased to announce that I will be offering a pen sized Tidashi as an add-on. The Desk-Tidashi will be made from the same grade 5 titanium and will be offered in the same finishes as the original Tidashi. A desk stand, handmade from a lush polished Black Walnut wood with a cork non slip bottom, will be included as well.



Disclaimer:

Both the original Tidashi and the Desk Version are tools that could be considered knives. Especially the desk version is quite a large desk tool which some customs agencies could consider a weapon. Please educate yourself on the laws of your country before pledging. Knives are shipped internationally all the time, and I will work with you to get it to you, but can not take responsibility for confiscation by customs.

story:
The moment you touch SOFF Blanket, you will be surprised by the luxuriously soft fabric. Whenever you touch SOFF Blanket, it will make you feel better and want to wrap yourself up in it. We wanted to make soft and warm blanket without using animal fur. 

Durability- INVARIABLE SOFT AND WARM

is the part that we put the most efforts while we produce the blanket.

There are many microfiber products on the market already, but it is difficult to find products like SOFF. Most of microfiber blankets become not fluffy after many uses or after washing or have bunch of lints that came after washing. We decided to make samples of improved durability and lint-Free blanket by using Korean best quality fabrics directly from the material that we produced. We believed that the quality of the product will be different when the fabric is different. That was how SOFF blanket was born.

There is a reason. 

The secret lies in the use of the BEST quality fabric specially made in Korea. SOFF Blanket can't be compared to other low quality fabric. 

SOFF is a brand made by a company that produces the BEST textiles in Korea and exports it to the world. We have been supplying high quality textiles to famous brands overseas.

Our Philosophy is to make blankets with high quality materials.

Softness that only SOFF can implement, the secret is in the Draw Textured Yarn. The yarn is made by joining the fine yarns of 192 strands and it is the basis of soft and light SOFF fabric.

   Draw Textured Yarn is made of fine yarn that is 100 times thinner than the hair.

Tricot Knitting Method which produces strong durability and high quality goods. 

This is why SOFF blanket has a soft and long lasting durability. 

We develop and make luxurious SOFF Blankets at our OWN Headquarters and factory. That's why SOFF can produce and manufacture great quality products at reasonable prices.  

SOFF creates minimalist objects that make our lives better and more convenient. Established in 1989, our company has been in the textile business for two generations. 

SOFF blanket was created out of a deep understanding and knowledge of good raw materials. We are constantly researching and developing new materials. SOFF is proud of our high quality products made from the BEST materials.

SOFF can produce great quality products at affordable prices because we manufacture our own materials. We make our own fabric from high grade fibers so we can give you the BEST quality and the BEST price.

 SOFF blankets are made in our own factories. Our high quality microfibers cost more to make, but the quality of our materials surpass the quality of other blankets. 

Producing and making our own products from high grade fibers and materials are the biggest reason why SOFF can present to you the Best quality and Best priced products. 

 
We need your help to produce the BLANKETS and bring it to you. 

 

 

 - At Home

 - When you go on a picnic

 - In a bed

 - When you go on an outdoor sports game

 - For your doggy

 - Camping must-have item

- For your kitty

 

 

Share our project with your family and friends and we will give you 15% of every dollar you helped to raise!

story:
Does this sound familiar? 

Your evening meal still warm in your belly, the campfire now turned to red smoldering ashes. You fall asleep with a peaceful smile on your face, just to awaken suddenly at 2am by the shivering cold. You become restless, your teeth begin chattering, and you just can't get warm!

You’re miserable, freezing, rolling in and out of pitiful sleep knowing this is going to be a long, dreadful night. 

There are options for getting warm. But so few of them actually include SLEEP. 

And isn’t that what you came here to do? 

Now, imagine the same scenario. Only this time when you wake up cold at 2am, you simply drift right back off to sleep in a warm and toasty slumber, because instant warmth is at your fingertips by just the push of a button.

In the past, our options for warming up in the wild have been limited (to say the least)...

  • Chemical Hand Warmers? Awesome. My body has turned to ice, but at least my palms are sweating!  Besides, single use chemical warmers? They hit the trash and poison our planet, no thanks. 
  • Heat up water in my Nalgene? Listen, I'm the only one that should be needing to take a leak here. Waking up soaked because my bottle decided to tinkle? That's a bit counterproductive to the mission here. (this has actually happened to me, not cool. COLD, yes. but way not cool)
  • Do jumping jacks, push-ups, run in place? What is this? 24 Hour Fitness?! 2am is for restful, restorative sleep, NOT getting swole.
  • What Else? Rekindle the fire, heat up a rock, snuggle a bear, crawl into the wolves den?!!Maybe! People get desperate when they're cold!  I don't know about you, but I make it a habit to avoid 3rd degree burns (or animal maulings) in the wild. 

..And the list of heat-producing methods goes on and on and on. Most of which do NOT actually involve sleeping through the night.

After more cold, sleepless nights in the wild than I care to admit, I vowed to fix this problem with a reliable, sustainable, and modern solution that does not require disrupting your cozy sleeping quarters in search of warmth.

and so... the Hot Pocket was born! 

Interview with Dawson Wheeler, the founder of Rock/Creek
